headline: Kasule Lumumba :  Bobi Wine okuggyayo omusango yakikoze kwonoona kifaananyi kya kkooti
text: Kampala Ssaabawandiisi w’ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement (NRM), Justine Kasule Lumumba, alabudde bannabyabufuzi okukomya okweyagaliza n’ebigendererwa ebikyamu mu kifo ky’okwonoona ekifaananyi kya kkooti z’eggwanga. Ssaabawandiisi wa NRM, Kasule Lumumba  Kino kiddiridde munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP) era Pulezidenti waakyo Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu aka Bobi Wine okulagira bannamateeka be okuggyayo omusango mw’abadde awakanyiza obuwanguzi bwa Museveni ng’agamba nti kkooti yazeefuga. Lumumba yalumirizza Kyagulanyi nti okusooka yali agaanye okugenda mu kkooti kyokka n’amala ne yeekyusa, ekiraga nti yalina ebigendererwa bye. “Ensonga ya Mw. Kyagulanyi okugamba nti Ssaabalamuzi Owiny-Dollo n’Omulamuzi Mike Chibita okuva mu musango olw’okuba baakolaganako ne Museveni ky’abadde kyakwekwasa.” Lumumba bwe yagambye. Okusinziira Ku Lumumba, Pulezidenti Museveni abadde mu by’obufuzi n’obukulembeze okumala emyaka 50 nga kizibu okusanga omuntu atakolaganyeeko naye mu banene abali mu ggwanga. Lumumba yeewuunyizza lwaki Kyagulanyi yakyukidde ekitongole ekiramuzi ate nga mu 2020 omulamuzi Ssekaana yawa ensala ye, Kyagulanyi n’awangula omusango ku kuwandiisibwa kw’ekibiina kye. “Mw. Kyagulanyi ne banne baali basanyufu nga bawangudde omusango naye kati olw’okuba kkooti ensukkulumu yagaanye okubakkiriza okukola ennongoosereza mu mpaaba yaabwe era ne baweebwa amagezi ku kye balina okukola naye kati kkooti azivumirira.” Lumumba bwe yakkaatiriza. Lumumba yasabye Kyagulanyi okutawa bawagizi be ssuubi litaliiwo era bakomye okukkiririza mu bulimba obutambulira ku mutimbagano omuli n’emmeeri ya Amerika eyagobye e Mombasa.

headline: Bobi Wine alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku kuwagira okutulugunya bannansi
text: Kyaggwe Akwatidde ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu(Bobi Wine), alumbye Pulezidenti Museveni ku bigambo bye yayogedde ng’avumirira abeekalakaasa n’okubalabula obutakiddira. Bobi Wine nga atabaala Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bw’abadde anoonya akalulu mu bitundu by’e Mukono ku Mmande, agambye nti aba NRM bapangisa abavubuka ne babagatta mu bawagizi baabwe okukola effujjo ku poliisi n’amagye okubavumaganya. Kino kiddiridde Pulezidenti Museveni eggulo bwe yabadde ayogerako eri eggwanga, okulabula abeekalakaasi abakuba abapoliisi okukikomya era n’awagira ekya bakuumaddembe abakuba amasasi mu okwetaasa oluvannyuma lw’okukwata Kyagulanyi eyali e Luuka mu Busoga ng’anoonya akalulu. “Museveni yabadde ku ttivvi jjo n’agamba nti agenda kusasula abantu be battidde abantu baabwe naye abantu b’e Nakifuma ka mbabuuze, omuntu ayinza kusasula ssente mmeka okukuttira owuwo.” Kyagulanyi bw’abuuzizza abawagizi be. Kyagulanyi ategeezezza ab’e Nakifuma okunyweza obumu nga tebafudde ku mawanga g’abantu kubanga bonna ebibaluma bye bimu. Ab’eno Kyagulanyi abagambye nti olutalo lw’okuggya Museveni ku buyinza lugenda kubaamu okufiirwa n’okwelekereza era n’abakunga obutakomya kubanja ddembe lyabwe. Kyagulanyi yayaniriziddwa ebikumi n’ebikumi by’abantu e Nakifuma, yavuddewo bubi n’abakuumaddembe obwedda abamugaana okukozesa enguudo zimwasa njala nga bagamba nti kijja kuleetawo akalipaggano k’ebidduka mu kitundu kino. Abamu ku balonzi e Nakifuma Kyagulanyi bamusabye olutuuka mu ntebe asooke abakolerere ku by’obulamu, ebyenguudo wamu n’okubagobako obwavu obuyitiridde mu byalo byabwe.

headline: Omubaka Sseggirinya alayidde, agamba ssente z’emmotoka agenda kuzigabira abalonzi
text: Kampala Munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Muhammad Sseggirinya alayiziddwa ku bubaka bwa Kawempe North mu Palamenti y’e 11 era ono olumaze okukuba ebirayiro n’ategeeza nti ssente obukadde 200 ezigenda okumuweebwa okugula emmotoka ajja zigabira abalonzi. Sseggirinya eyavudde ebweru w’eggwanga n’adda okulayira ku katuuti, agenze bamukwatiridde era bw’abadde ayogerako eri abannamawulire agambye nti agenda kufuba okulaba nti buli maka mu  Kawempe bafuna ku buwoomi bwa ssente z’emmotoka zino. Ono agamba nti kino akikoze okulaba ng’addiza ku bantu be abaamwesiga ne bamusindika mu Palamenti eno. Era kuno agenda kwogerezaako enteekateeka ya Segibox nga muno agenda kuba awa buli maka amanaku mu Kawempe emitwalo 10 buli mwezi. “Sigenda kugula mmotoka mpya ng’enda kusigala nga nkozesa eno, ssente z’emmotoka ng’enda kuziwa bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’ategeezezza. Ono awadde eky’okulabirako ekyali e Bufalansa mu 1789  olw’okwejalabya kwa Kabaka waayo, Louis XVI n’omukyala Marie Antoinette, abaali mu bulamu obulungi ate nga bannansi baavu lunkupe.  “Bali mu kugula mmotoka za bbeeyi ng’abalonzi baabwe babonaabona olw’ebyobulamu ebibi, ebyenjigiriza bifu n’ebizibu ebirala. Nze saagala kubeera bwetyo y’ensonga lwaki obukadde 200 ez’emmotoka nziwadde bannakawempe.” Sseggirinya bw’akiggumiza. Buli mubaka asuubirwa okuweebwa ssente obukadde 200 basobole okugulamu emmotoka ezinaabayamba okutambulizaamu emirimu mu kisanja kino eky’emyaka ettaano. Sseggirinya agamba akyali mulwadde olw’ebyo ebyamutuusibwako mu kkomera e Kitalya era ng’asuubira okuddayo e Nairobi gy’amaze omwezi omulamba ng’ajjanjabwa ekibumba n’amatu.

headline: Bobi Wine, Amuriat, Muntu basabye abantu balonde  bakuume akalulu
text: Kampala Abeesimbyewo ku bwapulezidenti okuli; Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu (Bobi Wine), Patrick Oboi Amuriat ne Mugisha Muntu, basabye bannayuganda okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe oluvannyuma lw’okulonda ku Lwokuna. Mugisha Muntu, Oboi Amuriat ne Bobi Wine Bano okusaba kuno bakukoledde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe batuuzizza ku Hotel Africana olwaleero ku Lwokubiri. Kyagulanyi ne banne basabye bannayuganda okukuuma akalulu k’omulundi guno nga tebafuddeyo ku kibiina kya byabufuzi oli mw’ali naye balwanirire obuwanguzi bwa bannayuganda. Bino we bijjidde ng’ebbula ennaku bbiri zokka eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda era ng’abooludda oluvuganya baluubirira okuwangula Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni, amaze emyaka 35 mu ntebe. Bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire, alina kkaadi ya FDC, Patrick Oboi Amuriat, ategeezezza nti omulimu omunene gusigalidde kakiiko ka byakulonda okulaba ng’okulonda kubeera kw’amazima kuba bo beegasse okwanika ebirumira ebinaakubeeramu. “Njagala okutegeeza akakiiko k’ebyokulonda nti bwe baba tebasobola kutegeka kalulu kalimu mazima n’obwenkanya, babeera tebalina mugaso ng’ekitongole.” Amuriat bw’agambye. Ate ye alina bbendera ya Alliance for National Transformation (ANT), Mugisha Muntu, agambye nti bo ng’abavuganya omulimu gwabwe bagukoze nga kati kiri eri bannayuganda okumaliriza ekkatala lino. Muntu agambye nti bannayuganda abawerako balaze nga bwe batagenda kulonda olw’emivuyo egibadde mu kunoonya akalulu. Wabula ono abasabye okuvaayo balonde, olutalo lusobole okuwangulwa. Ye Kyagulanyi Ssentamu nga yeesimbyewo ku kkaadi ya NUP, yennyamidde olw’okutulugunyizibwa ab’ebyokwerinda era nga bano baamutandikirawo nga yaakamala okwewandiisa. Bobi Wine annyonnyodde nti mu Uganda gwafuuka musango okuvuganya Pulezidenti Museveni. Kyagulanyi asabye bannayuganda okuvaayo okulonda mu bungi era bakuume akalulu kaabwe era baleme kugendera ku bigambo bya ssentebe w’akakiiko k’ebyokulonda,Simon Byabakama, eyabalagidde okudda eka. “ Temugendera ku bigambo bya Byabakama kubanga bimenya amateeka, temulina tteeka lyonna lye mubeera mumenye okusigala ku bifo awalonderwa okukuuma akalulu kammwe.” Bobi Wine bw’agambye. Ono asabye abantu okukozesa essimu zaabwe okukwata buvidiyo n’ebifaananyi singa balaba ebitagenda bulungi mu kalulu era beeyambise omutimbagano ku Uvote. Mu nsisinkano eno, eyavuganyako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kiiza Besigye, yeewuunyizza ku butabanguko obubadde mu kkampeyini z’omulundi guno nga wadde yavuganyako emirundi egisoba mu ena, naye tabulabangako.

headline: Bobi Wine agamba eby’okukuza Muhoozi bamusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti
text: Akulira ekibiina ki National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi (Bobi Wine) agamba ekya Museveni okukuza mutabani we Lt Gen Muhoozi Kainerugaba namutuusa ku ddaala lya Genero omujjuvu kigendereddwamu kumusembereza ntebe ya bwapulezidenti. Bino Kyagulanyi yabyogedde wakayita ssaawa busaawa nga Pulezidenti Museveni agobye mutabani we ku kifo ky’omudduumizi w’eggye ly’okuttaka wabula ate namukuza okufuuka Genero. Kainerugaba, Museveni yamusikizza Lt Gen Kayanja Muhanga. Bweyabadde ayogera ku nkyukakyuka zino, Kyagulanyi yagambye nti, “Oluvannyuma lw’okuteeka obubaka obw’ekiralu ku Twitter natiisatiisa Kenya ku Mmande, Pulezidenti Museveni asazeewo awe mutabani we ekirabo kya Genero. Ono mu bwangu agenda kuwummuzibwa akakatibwe ku bannansi nga Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, abo bonna abaagaliza Uganda ebirungi kino balina okukigaana.” Kyagulanyi agamba nti Museveni ne mutabani we bebali emabega w’okulinyirira eddembe ly’obuntu era nga bebasinga okukifunamu kuba Uganda baagala gitambuza nga bwebagala. Ono asabye amawanga g’abazungu okukomya okuteeka ssente mu gavumenti ya Museveni kuba tezigasa bannansi wabula gavumenti ezikozesa kubatulugunya nga kino kirina okukoma okutaasa ebiseera bya Uganda eby’omu maaso. Enkyukakyuka zino ezaakoleddwa zavudde ku Muhoozi okusinziira ku mutimbagano gwe ogwa Twitter nategeeza nti ye n’abajaasi be beetaaga wiiki 2 zokka nga bamaze okuwamba ekibuga ekikulu ekya Kenya ki Nairobi. Kino kyatabudde abantu abawerako era nga bangi basoose kulowooza nti waliwo abayingidde mu kibanja kye wabula oluvannyuma yakakasizza nti obubaka buno yeyabutaddeyo naye yabadde asaaga.

headline: Eby’okuwamba abantu mubiggyeemu eby’obufuzi, mubayimbule – Kkangaawo Mulondo
text: Bya Ssemakula Bulemeezi Omwami wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka atwala essaza Bulemeezi, Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo, asabye gavumenti okuggya eby’obufuzi mu nsonga z’abantu abawambibwa wasobole okubaawo obwenkanya eri abantu bano. Abamu ku bakulembeze abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno Kkangaawo Mulondo ayagala abakwate basimbibwe mu kkooti eziragirwa mu mateeka mu kifo ky’okubakuumira mu bifo ebitamanyiddwa ekirinnyirira eddembe lyabwe. “Tetuwakanya muntu mumenyi w’amateeka kukwatibwa naye tugamba nti omuntu bwakwatibwa ng’alina etteeka ly’amenya, atwalibwe avunaanibwe mu kifo ekimanyiddwa obulungi era aweebwe ekibonerezo ng’amateeka bwegalagira.” Kkangaawo Mulondo bwe yasabye. Kkangaawo yagasseeko nti akadde katuuse bakolere wamu nga bannabulemeezi era babeeko ekintu eky’enkizo kye bamanyibwako, okusobola okutwala essaza lino mu maaso. Kkangaawo Ronald Mulondo Okusinziira ku Kkangaawo Mulondo, mu nsisinkano eno bakubaganyizza ebirowoozo ku by’obulamu, ebyenjigiriza n’ensonga endala zonna n’ekigendererwa ky’okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka mu kitundu kino. Ono yabasabye okwegattira awamu awatali kusososola mu nzikiriza za byabufuzi, basobole okukyusa ekitundu kyabwe era bakkaatirize eddoboozi eryawamu. Bo abeetabye mu nsisinkano eno okuli; Omubaka Ssekabira Dennis owa Katikamu North n’owa Katikamu South Hassan Kirumira, bagambye nti ebikolobero bingi ebigenda maaso mu ggwanga nga byonna byetaaga okulwanyisibwa awatali kubiyingizaamu byabufuzi. Ate ye omubaka omulonde owa Nakaseke Central, Allan Mayanja Ssebunnya, yategeezezza nti ekiseera kino kyakusitula abantu b’e Bulemeezi abasembayo wansi awatali kusosola. Abakulembeze bano era baasiimye Kkangaawo olw’ensisinkano eno bwebatyo ne beeyama okutwala Bulemeezi ku ntikko.

headline: Jacob Oulanyah bamututte mu kkooti ku by’okuwangula ekifo kya Sipiika
text: Kampala Munnamateeka Hassan Male Mabirizi addukidde mu kkooti ya East Africa elafubanira obwenkanya nawakanya okulondebwa kwa Jacob Oulanyah nga Sipiika omuggya owa Palamenti y’e 11 gwagamba nti yalondeddwa mu bukyamu. Okusinziira ku biwandiiko Mabirizi byatutte mu woofiisi za kkooti eno e Kololo, Mabirizi agamba nti obululu obwalangiriddwa bwabadde bungi okusinga ku muwendo gw’ababaka ababaddewo ku lunaku lw’okulonda ekintu ekimenya amateeka. Mu musango guno, Mabirizi era awakanya ekya Ssaabalamuzi Alfonse Owiny Dollo okukulemberamu okulondesa kuno ate nga Oulanyah mukwano gwe era nga yamuteeka ku biwandiiko bye ebimwogerako nga abamu ku bantu abasobola okumuweera obujulizi ku bimukwatako. Kati Mabirizi ayagala kkooti ya ‘East African Court of Justice’ erangirire nti okulondebwa kwa Oulanyah kwali kukyamu era eragire wategekebwewo okulonda okuggya okusobola okulonda Sipiika omutuufu. Ono ayagala n’okulonda kwa Sipiika kw’omumyuka wa Sipiika nakwo kuddibwemu kubanga Oulanyah eyali akukubiriza yali mukyamu kuba naye okulondebwa kwe nakwo kwali kukyamu era kulina okuddibwamu. Ekirindiriddwa kwe kulaba oba kkooti eno enagenda mu maaso n’okuwulira omusango guno era oba kinaasoboka okulondebwa kuno okuddamu okutegekebwa. Kinajjukirwa nti wiiki ewedde ababaka bakungaanira e Kololo okulonda Sipiika n’omumyuka we era nga olwokaano lwalimu bannakibiina kya NRM babiri okuli Rebecca Kadaga ne Jacob Oulanyah awamu ne Ssemujju Nganda owa FDC. Gyebyagweredde nga Oulanyah awangudde obwa Sipiika ate ekifo ky’omumyuka wa Sipiika nekiwangulwa Anita Among eyawangudde Muhammad Nsereko ne Yusufu Nsibambi.

headline: Pulezidenti Museveni alagidde akalulu ka mmeeya w’ e Ntebe kaddemu okubalibwa
text: Kampala Omukulembeze w’eggwanga, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, ayingidde mu nsonga z’akalulu k’e Ntebe akaaviiriddeko omujaasi w’eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti erya ‘Special Forces Commabd (SFC), okukuba omuwagizi essasi eryamusse ate abalala babiri ne bagendera ku bisago. Abamu ku bawagizi nga beekalakaasa Eggulo ku Lwokubiri, Maj. Anthony Mbaziira okuva mu SFC yategeezezza abaabadde beekalakaasa nti Pulezidenti Museveni agenda kusisinkana abeesimbyewo aba NRM wamu n’owa Democratic Party (DP), abagamba nti babbiddwako obuwanguzi bwabwe. “Pulezidenti Museveni ayagala akalulu kaddemu okubalibwa era oyo yenna anaasangibwa nga ye yawangudde akalulu kano, y’agenda okulangirirwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda. Agenda kusisinkana abaabadde beesimbyewo bonna, abasaba musigale nga muli bakkakkamu.” Maj. Mbaziira bwe yagambye. Akulira ebyokulonda mu Wakiso, ku Lwokubiri yalangiridde Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina nga mmeeya wa Munisipaali y’e Ntebe omulonde, ekintu ekyatabudde abawagizi ba NRM ne DP. Olwokaano luno lwabaddemu abeesimbyewo 6 okuli; Vincent Kayanja Depaul owa DP, Mohammad Kawuma atalina kibiina, Fabrice Rulinda atalina kibiina, Micheal Mutebi owa NRM ne Kenneth Ssimbwa owa ANT. Oluvannyuma lw’okulangirira Rulinda nti y’awangudde, abawagizi ba NRM ne DP batabuse nga bagamba nti tekisoboka kuba Rulinda yabadde akutte ekifo kyakusatu era wano baatandise okwekalakaasa amagye agakuuma omukulembeze w’eggwanga ne galeetebwa okukakkanya embeera. Wakati ng’abapoliisi bagobagana n’abeebyokwerinda, amasasi gaakutte ssentebe wa NRM owa Kitubulu – Katabi, Eric Kyeyune era n’afiirawo ate n’abalala babiri ne batwalibwa mu malwaliro nga bali bubi.

headline: Beti Kamya : Ndeeta bukodyo bupya okulwanyisa enguzi
text: Kampala Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti omuggya, Beti Olive Namisango Kamya, ategeezezza nti alina obukodyo obupya bw’aleese okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga era akakase abo abakyamubuusabuusa ku busobozi bwe mu kifo kino. Pulezidenti Museveni yalonda Beti Kamya okubeera Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti ng’adda mu bigere by’Omulamuzi Irene Mulyagonja. Wano abamu ku batunuulizi b’ensonga baamukubyemu ebituli nga bagamba nti si ye muntu omutuufu alina okutuula mu woofiisi eno. Kino kyaddiridde ekisanja kya Irene Mulyagonja okuggwaako nga July 5, 2020 wabula omwaka gwonna gwaggwaako nga Museveni talondeddemu muntu. Eggulo ku Ssande, Beti Kamya yatuuzizza olukung’aana lwa bannamawulire n’ategeeza nti okusoomooza okumwolekedde nga Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti akumanyi bulungi. Kamya agamba nti mu bukodyo bw’atandika nabwo kwe kuyigiriza abantu obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe mu kulwanyisa enguzi nga bakwatagana naye. Ono yagasseeko nti yeetegese ekimala era n’asaba bannayuganda okumwegattako basobole okulwanyisa enguzi ekyalemesezza ensi okukulaakulana. “Nneebaza Pulezidenti olw’okunneesiga n’anyongera obuvunaanyizibwa. Nze muntu omutuufu era nkakasa nja kubutuukiriza kuba ebisaanyizo mbirina. Abo abanjogerera mbakwatibwa ekisa kuba ng’enda kubaswaza.” Beti Kamya bwe yagambye. Kamya yannyonnyodde nti Ssemateeka n’etteeka eriteekawo woofiisi ya Kaliisoliiso, bimuwa obuyinza okukola emirimu gye awatali kuyingirirwa muntu yenna era asuubira okutumbula woofiisi eno. Ono agamba nti amaanyi ge gagenda kuba mu kukunga bannayuganda n’abakozi ba gavumenti basobole okumuwa obuwagizi asobole okulwanyisa enguzi mu ggwanga nga. Kinajjukirwa nti mu 2018, Pulezidenti Museveni yatabukira eyali Kaliisoliiso Irene Mulyagonja olw’okulemwa okulwanyisa enguzi mu woofiisi za gavumenti era gye byaggweera ng’ataddewo akakiiko mu maka g’Obwapulezidenti okulwanyisa enguzi era kano kakulirwa Lt. Col. Edith Nakalema. Wabula wadde yakatondawo, enguzi ekyalemeddewo ekiraga nti omulimu ogwolekedde Beti Kamya munene okusinga bw’alowooza.

headline: Tujja kukolagana n’omuntu yenna bannakenya gwe banalonda – Museveni
text: Pulezidenti Yoweri Kaguta Museveniategeezezza nti Uganda nneetegefu okukolagana n’omukulembeze yenna bannakenya gwe banaalonda ku bwapulezidenti .”Yenna anaayitamu okubeera Pulezidenti w’e Kenya. Tujja kukolagana naye kasita anaabeera ng’alondeddwa bannansi.” Museveni bw’annyonnyodde. Akalulu mu ggwanga lya Kenya kasembedde nga kagenda kubibwa nga August 9, 2022 lwe bagenda okulondera ababaka mu lukiiko lw’e ggwanga, n’olukiiko oluddako awamu n’abakulembeze omuli ba Gavana awamu n’enkiiko eza wansi. BinoMuseveni yabyogedde asiibula abadde omubaka wa Kenya mu ggwanga, AmbasadaKiema Kilonzo. Kilonzo abadde amaze emyaka 3 mu kifo kino nga yasazeewo okuddayo mu Kenya asobole okuvuganya ku kifo kya Gavana we Kitui. Okusinziira ku Museveniomukwano wakati w’amawanga gano gombi gwe gusinga amakulu nga si nsonga ani abeera awangudde obwapulezidenti enkolagana ebeera erina okugenda mu maaso. AmbasadaKilonzo yeebazizza Pulezidenti Museveni olw’okumuteerawo embeera ennungi mu myaka 3 gy’amaze mu kifo ng’esobozesezza ebyensubulagana wakati Uganda ne Kenya wadde wabaddewo ekirwadde kya Corona. Ono era yeebazizza gavumenti ne bannayuganda olw’omukwano gwe bamulaze ekisobozesezza enkolagana wakati w’amawanga gombi okugenda mu maaso. “Nga nsiibula okuva wano, njagala okukiddamu nti bannayuganda bandaze omukwano era wano wafuuse waffe.” Kilonzo bw’agambye. Kilonzo yalondebwa Pulezidenti Uhuru Kenyatta mu 2018 in 2018, okubeera Ambasada wa Kenya e Uganda.

headline: Kaliisoliiso Beti Kamya avudde mu by’okunoonyereza ku bukadde 40 ezaweebwa ababaka
text: Kaliisoliiso wa gavumenti, Beti Kamya ategeezezza nga bwavudde mu kunoonyereza ku nsimbi obukadde 40 ezigambibwa okuweebwa buli mubaka wa Palamenti nga agamba nti abatwalayo omusango baguggyeeyo. Bino Kaliisoliiso Kamya abyogeredde mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire olutudde mu Kampala bw’abadde alambulula ku nteekateeka z’okukuza olunaku lw’okukaza abakozi bagavumenti okuwa abantu empeereza egwanidde. Kamya annyonnyodde nti nga Kaliisoliiso talina buyinza kusigala nga anoonyereza ku nsonga eno ate nga bannanyini yo abagitwalayo bagiggyeeyo era neyetonda mu lukiiko lwe ggwanga olukulu. Ono agasseeko nti bannayuganda balina okufuna empeereza esinga okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti era tebakkiriza okubuzibwabuzibwa awamu n’okumalirwa obudde okuva mu bunafu n’enkola y’emirimu ey’ekibogwe okuva mu bakozi ba gavumenti. “Enguzi tekoma ku kulyanguzi oba okuwa emirimu abantu abatalina bisaanyizo oba okubulankanya ssente naye n’omuntu alemwa okukola kyateekeddwa okukola nga ate asasulwa abeera alidde enguzi,” Beti Kamya bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti enkola y’okumala gakola mu bakozi bagavumenti efiiriza gavumenti ssente nnyingi era esobola okugoba bamusigansimbi nga batya okuteeka kuno ensimbi zabwe nga abantu emirimu bagikola mu ngeri ya neemalidde. Kamya asabye bannamawulire n’abantu ba bulijjo okuyambako okwanika abo bonna abakola ebikolwa by’obuli bw’enguzi nga batuuka ekikeerezi awamu n’okwebulankanya ku mirimu. Okusinziira ku alipoota ya kalisoliiso, wofiisi ezisinze okutunulirwa mwemuli woofisi z’ebyettaka, abakozi ba gavumenti mu gavumenti ezebitundu saako abasawo n’ebitongole ebirala. Ekitongole kino kigamba nti kifunye emisango 320 okuva mu July omwaka oguwedde era egisinga gitandise okulondolwa. Ye akulira okukung’aanya emisango gino, Justus Kareebe ategeezezza nti emisango egisinga gyekuusa nyo ku bulyazamanya abakozi ba gavumenti, obutakanya mu bakozi saako emivuyo mu bukiiko obugaba emirimu gya gavumenti. Abakulu bano era balabudde ebitongole byonna ebya gavumenti ku kwerimbika mu woofiisi esembayo waggulu okusobola okukola ebitali ku mateeka nti bubakeeredde kuba amateeka gaba obuyinza okunoonyereza ku woofiisi zonna mu ggwanga nga oggyeeko eya Pulezidenti.

headline: Kafeero Ssekitoleko : Okweyagaliza kwa banene mu kibiina kwe kutusudde
text: Bya Jesse Lwanga Nakifuma Abadde omubaka w’essaza lya Nakifuma mu Palamenti, Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko, akkiriza nga bwe yawanguddwa mu kalulu wabula ng’okugwa kwe akutadde ku banene mu kibiina b’agamba nti basussizza okweyagaliza. Hon Kafeero Ssekitoleko nga ayozaayoza Fred Ssimbwa eyawangudde ekya Nakifuma  Kafeero alaze okutya nti ekibiina kye ekya National Resistance Movement NRM kiri mu buzibu singa abakikulembera tebateekawo mpuliziganya n’omuntu wa wansi asembayo ku kyalo. Ssekitoleko alumirizza nti ebintu ebirina okuyamba abantu ebiva waggulu mu kibiina bikoma mu banene era ng’eno y’ensonga lwaki abantu babasuddeyo ng’akabonero akooleka obusungu abantu bwe babalinako. Ono asuubizza nga bwe bagenda okuddayo batuule n’abakulu mu kibiina basobole okugonjoola ekizibu kino era n’asaba abantu b’e Nakifuma okwegatta bave mu ntalo z’ebyobufuzi. Kafeero agambye nti tagenda kuwanika era nga 2026 agenda kudda yeddize ekifo kye kuba akyali muto mu myaka. Wabula ye Ssaabakunzi wa NRM mu ttundutundu lya Mukono omuli; Kayunga, Buikwe, Buvuma ne Mukono, Patric Mubiru akukkulumidde abalonzi olwokuva mu NRM ne balonda NUP ky’agamba nti kigenda kuzza ekitundu kino emabega. Mubiru annyonnyodde nti emu ku nsonga lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni naye yawanguddwa mu kitundu kino lwakuba akalulu kanoonyezebwa mu ngeri ya ssaayansi ssaako n’abavubuka abaalonda mu bungi mu kitundu kino. Wadde ekibiina kya NRM kyakoze bubi mu kitundu kino, naye bannakibiina bayisizza ebivvulu oluvannyuma lw’omuntu waabwe okuwangula Omubaka Robert Kyagulanyi ku bwapulezidenti. Kinajjukirwa nti, ababaka bonna abaabadde ne kkaadi ya NRM mu kitundu kino, kumpi bonna baasuuliddwa nga ku bano kuliko; Johnson Muyanja Ssenyonga yawanguddwa Fred Kayondo owa DP, Hon. Ronald Kibuule yawanguddwa Munnamateeka Abdullah Kiwanuka, Hon Robert Kafeero Ssekitoleko yawaguddwa Fred Ssimbwa, Abbasi Ssozi yawaguddwa Hon Bakireke Betty Nambooze abaddeyo, ate ow’abakyala Margaret Nakavubu n’awangulwa Hanifah Nabukeera nga bonna ba kibiina kya NUP.

headline: Omuloodi waali: Erias Lukwago akulembeddemu banne ku bwaloodimmeeya
text: Kampala Omuloodi wa Kampala Erias Lukwago ayolekedde okulangirirwa nga Loodimmeeya omulonde ow’ekibuga Kampala nga mu lwokaano addirirwa Nabilah Naggayi Ssempala ow’ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP). Omuloodi Erias Lukwago nga akuba akalulu Ebiva mukulonda biraga nti ku bifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa Erias Lukwago akubidde waggulu mubitundu nga Lubaga, Makindye, Kawempe awamu n’awalala. Ono banne abalala bwebavuganya okuli Daniel Kazibwe amanyiddwa nga Ragga Dee ne Joseph Mayanja amanyiddwa nga Jose Chameleone, olwokaano terubatambulidde bulungi. Oluvannyuma lw’okulonda okukomekerezebwa era obululu nebutandika okubalibwa, abawagizi ba Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago batandise okujaganya olw’ omuntu waabwe okulembera olwokaano luno. Bano okuli; abavuzi batakisi, ababoodabooda, abatembeeyi n’abantu abalala abagamba nti Lukwago abadde abalwanirira balabiddwako ku nguudo za Kampala nga bajaganya olw’obuwanguzi buno. E Nateete mu Mackay Zzooni, abawagizi ba Lukwago balabiddwako nga batambula n’empapula wamu ne kkalaamu nga bawandika obululu bwa Lukwago mubifo eby’enjawulo awalonderwa. Ku kifo awalonderwa ekya Njovu mu zzooni ya Lubya, Erias Lukwago afunye obululu 433 naddirirwa Nabilah n’obululu 161. Daniel Kazibwe nafuna obululu 42 ate Chameleone nafuna obululu 36 so nga Charles James Ssenkubuge afunyewo akalulu 06. Nakivubo Blue, Lukwago afunye obululu 305 ate Nabilah Naggayi afunye obululu 53, Kazinwe afunye 22, Joseph Mayanja 12 ate Charles Ssenkubuge owa DP nafuna akalulu 1 ate nga abalala tebafunyewo. Ekisinze okucamula bannakampala kwekuba nti nekifo kyenyini Nabilah walondera ku Katuuso Church of Uganda Lukwago awangulidde waggulu battunka nabo. Wano, Charles afunye 3, Nabillah Naggayi 95, Omuloodi Erias Lukwago afunye 414, Daniel Kazibwe 20 ate Joseph Mayanja nafuna 23.

headline: Ab’Emmamba abaawangula basisinkanye omutaka Gabunga
text: Bazukkulu ba Gabunga abaawangula ebifo ebyenjawulo mu kalulu akaawedde aka 2021, eggulo baakedde kusisinkana Omutaka omukulu Owaakasolya k’Emmamba, Jjajja Gabunga Mubiru Zziikwa, okuwoza olutabaalo. Mu bano mulimu abaawangula obwakkansala, bammeeya, n’ababaka ba Palamenti awamu n’abalala. Abamu ku bayitamu nga bawa Jjajja Gabunga ettu Mu bakulembeze abazze kwe kwabadde Mmeeya wa munisipaali y’e Kira Julius Mutebi, omubaka w’ekibuga Lugazi omulonde, Stephen Sserubula n’abalala nga bano balombojjedde jjajja bwe embeera gye bayitamu. Omubaka omulonde owa Munisipaali y’e Lugazi, Stephen Sserubula, yategeezezza nti baakutunuulira obusobozi obwa buli Mutuba mu kika ky’Emmamba, okulaba ogusinga okukola obulungi. Ate ye mmeeya wa Kira, Julius Mutebi yagambye nti, “Jjajja twagala okukwebaza weebale kukuuma kika kyaffe ne bonna abakukwatirako era tujja kusanyuka nnyo nga tuyitibwa okuwa ebirowoozo byaffe ku ebyo bye tulowooza ebisobola okutumbula ekika kyaffe.” Omubaka Sserubula bwe yagambye. Jjajja w’ekika ky’mmamba, Omutaka Mubiru Zziikwa ng’aliwamu ne bakulembeze banne, b’ozaayozezza bazukkulu baabwe olwokutuuka ku kkula ly’obululembeze kyokka ne babasaba obuteerabira kika kyabwe. “Nga bwe mwalidde obwami temuddeyo kudigida budigizi ate mu kung’aanye abazzukulu era mweweeyo okukikulaakulanya,” Omutaka Mubiru Zziikwa bwe yategeezezza. Ate Ssaabawandiisi w’ekika ky’Emmamba, Andrew Benon Kibuuka, yabasabye mu buli kye bakola bakulembeze ekika kyabwe era bafube okukiweereza awamu n’okukiyiyiza, kisobole okukulaakulana.

headline: AKALULU 2021: Ebyokwerinda binywezeddwa nga Bobi Wine ne Amuriat beewandiisa
text: Kampala Poliisi n’amagye biyiiriddwa mu bungi ku nguudo ezigenda okukozesebwa munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu ne Munnakibiina kya Forum for Democratic Change (FDC), nga bagenda okwewandiisa e Kyambogo. Robert Kyagulanyi ne mukyala we Barbie Kyagulanyi Ab’ebyokwerinda balabiddwako e Magere, Kisaasi, Nakawa n’emu bitundu bya Kampala nga; Nateete, Kibuye, Najjankumbi, Kamwokya, ewa Kisekka wamu n’ebifo ebirala. Poliisi yawandiikidde Bobi Wine ng’emulaga amakubo g’alina okukozesa era n’emusaba aganywerereko kimusobozese okutuuka mu budde. Bano baakakasizza bwe bagenda okuwerekera Kyagulanyi okuva ewaka we okutuuka w’alina okwewandiisiza n’abantu abo abakkiriziddwa akakiiko k’ebyokulonda okumuwerekera. Bobi Wine agenda kuyita; Magere, Kumbuzi, Kisaasi, Ntinda Stretcher, Spear Motors, ku Masang’anzira ga Kyambogo University okutuuka ku kisaawe ky’e Kyambogo w’agenda okwewandiisiza. Poliisi ekkakkanya obujagalalo eyiiriddwa mu bungi mu bitundu bya Kampala ebyenjawulo nga Makindye nga kigambibwa nti eno abawagizi ba People Power babadde baatandise okukung’aana. Bobi Wine asimbudde e Magere okwolekera e Kyambogo era ng’awerekeddwako mukyala we, Barbie Kyagulanyi wamu ne bannakibiina abalala.

headline: Omubaka wa Busiro North omulonde avunaaniddwa okubba essimu
text: Omubaka omulonde owa Busiro North era munnakibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP), Paul Nsubuga, asimbiddwa mu kkooti n’avunaanibwa omusango gw’okubba essimu ebalirirwamu emitwalo 8 egya Ssiringi. Omubaka Nsubuga nga ali mu kaguli Nsubuga ow’emyaka 29 asimbiddwa mu kkooti ya Buganda Road ey’eddaala erisooka, Doreen kalungi n’avunaanibwa. Wabula ono emisango agyegaanye. Kino kiddiridde poliisi okutegeeza nti yabadde ekutte omubaka Nsubuga oluvannyuma lw’obutambi okusaasaanira omutimbagano obulaga omubaka ono ng’abba essimu ku bamu ku bawala abaali mu dduuka mu Kampala. Oludda oluwaabi lulumiriza nti nga 3/06/2020 Nsubuga omutuuze w’e Nansana mu Wakiso disitulikiti bwe yali e Nakasero ku Ssemaduuka wa Shoprite, yabba essimu y’ekika kya Itel ebalirirwamu emitwalo 8 eyali eya Nicholas Karuhanga. Kkooti era etegeezeddwa nti ku nnaku z’omwezi ze zimu era e Nakasero, Nsubuga yabba ssente obukadde 4 n’ekitundu okuva ku Nicholas Karuhanga. Ono ayimbuddwa ku kakalu ka kkooti ka mitwalo 4 ez’obuliwo ate abamweyimiridde okuli ne Jjajja we, Charles Kasozi ow’emyaka 72, Mmeeya wa Kakiri Town Council ne maama we omuto Santrina Namuli buli omu n’asabibwa akakadde ka ssente ezitali zabuliwo. Ono alagiddwa okudda mu kkooti nga 29/03/2021 okuddamu okuwulira omusango gwe era nga kisuubirwa nti poliisi ejja kuba emalirizza okunnoonyereza ku nsonga ye. .

headline: Abantu 500 bokka be bayitiddwa okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Kampala Enteekateeka z’okuziika Ssaabasumba wa Kampala, Dr. Cyprian Kiziito Lwanga nga zigenda mu maaso, Ekereziya Katolika evuddeyo n’etegeeza nti abantu 500 bokka be bagenda okukkirizibwa okuziika era nti bano baamaze dda n’okutegeezebwa ku nteekateeka eno. Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa nkya munda mu Ekereziya ya Lubaga wabula abakulu ba Ekereziya bategeezezza nti okusalawo ku muwendo gw’abantu kyakoleddwa okusobola okutangira ensaasaana ya Ssennyiga kolona.  “Tukimanyi nti buli muntu alina eddembe okukungubaga era tewali asaana kulimuggyako mu buli mbeera wabula waliwo abantu abalondeddwa Ekereziya n’aboobuyinza mu Gavumenti. Abo be bagenda okukiikirira ffe abalala  olw’okuba nti tuli mu biseera bya Ssenyiga Kolona.” Rev.Fr. Nicholas Mulumba omwogezi w’Obusumba bwa Kampala bw’ategeezezza. Rev.Fr Mulumba era ayongedde n’atangaaza ku nsonga eno nti tewali kya njawulo kyesigamiziddwako okulonda abantu abagenda okuziika okuggyako okuba nti bakulisitu ate nga beebo abalina akakwate akaamaanyi ku mugenzi. Ono yeegattidwako omwogezi wa poliisi mu Kampala n’emiriraano, Luke Oweyesigire, akkaatirizza nti bagenda kubeera bulindaala nnyo ku nsonga y’okutangira  ekirwadde kya Kolona okusaasaana era n’asaba abakungubazi okukakasa nti bambala obukookolo bwabwe. Ono era alabudde nti wagenda kubaawo okutataaganya eby’entambula naddala ku nguudo ezolekera Ekereziya ye Lubaga. Wano agambye nti abavuzi ba boodabooda tebagenda kukkirizibwa ku nguudo zino okuggyako nga balina ebipapula (stickers) ate nga nabo bagenda kulambikibwa enguudo ze banaakozesa.  Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangibwa mu kisenge kye ng’afudde ku Lwomukaaga kumakya ng’entabwe yava ku kirwadde kya mutima. Ono yafiiridde ku myaka 68, wabula ng’abadde Ssaabasumba okumala emyaka 15.

headline: Abakulu mu poliisi bagenze ewa Bisoopu Kaggwa okumwetondera
text: Masaka Abanene mu poliisi beesitudde nebagenda ew’Omusumba w’essaza ly’e Masaka eyawummula, John Baptist Kaggwa, bamwetondere ku kikolwa kya basajja baayo okukuba ttiyaggaasi mu Mmisa wamu n’okulagira abaabadde bakung’aanye buli omu okulaba eryamuleese. Afande Kasingye ne Ttiimu ye nga beetongera Omusumba Kaggwa Ku bano kubaddeko akwanaganya poliisi n’ebyobufuzi, Asan Kasingye, akulira eby’okuketta mu poliisi, Ddamulira Christopher SSerunjogi, n’akulira eby’obutendekebwa Godfrey Ggoloba. Abapoliisi bamusanze mu maka ge ku ssaza e Kitovu era ng’ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu n’Omusumba wa Masaka aliko mu kiseera kino, Omusumba Serverus Jjumba. Kasingye asoose kwetonda ku ebyo ebyaliwo n’asaba abo bonna abategeka emikolo okusookanga okufuna olukkusa kubanga ekiseera kye tulimu kya Ssennyiga Corona. “Nze nga munnaddini nabasonyiwa dda kuba kiri mu nzikiriza yaffe okusonyiwa.” Omusumba Kaggwa bw’ategezezza nga yaakatandika okwogera. Omusumba Kaggwa agambye nti abapoliisi tebaawa bantu bali Mugulu kwennyonnyolako era ng’embeera y’obunkenke gyebaateekamu abantu yali teyeetaagisa era nga n’ebiragiro bya Ssennyiga Corona byali bikwatiddwa bulungi. Era Omusumba abasabye ab’ebyokwerinda okukolayo ekiwandiiko ekyetondera eggwanga lyonna olwebyo bye bakoze, kisobole okuzza emitima gy’abantu. Kasingye yeebazizza Omusumba Kaggwa olw’okubasonyiwa n’asuubizza nti bagenda kubagawo ekiwandiiko ekyetonda mu butongole eri bannansi era nga kino kkopi bajja kugiweerezaako akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba, Katikkiro wa Buganda wamu n’abeekika ky’Embogo. Ye ate Omusumba w’e Masaka, Bishop Serverus Jjumba, alaze obwennyamivu ku bikolwa bya poliisi era n’abasaba okweddako.

headline: Owek. Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka ku buyiiya n’obumalirivu
text: Kamalabyonna Charles Peter Mayiga akuutidde abavubuka wonna mu ggwanga okubeera abayiiya, abagumiikiriza, era abeesimbu bwebaba baagala okugenda mu maaso basobole okwekalakaanya. Entanda Katikkiro Mayiga agiwadde bw’abadde asisinkanye abavubuka abakulisitaayo okuva mu matendekero ag’enjawulo abeegattira mu kibiina ki National Christian Association. “Obulamu buli emijiji ena, ogusooka nga tuli mabujje, ogw’okubiri ogw’obuvubuka bwemulimu, Ogw’okusajjakula awamu n’obukadde. Naye omujiji ogusinga okubeera omukulu gwe gw’obuvubuka. Byokola ku myaka gino byebisalawo onaaba otya nga osajjakudde. Mulaba abantu abakulu nga babagamba nti yeeyisa nga omwana omuto ekitegeeza nti alina byatakola,” Owek. Mayiga. Abasabye okulemerako mwebyo byebakola basobole okugenda mu maaso mwebyo byebakola kibayambe okulaakulana. Owek. Mayiga abasabye okuwaayo obudde bweba baagala okulaba ku magoba geebyo byebatandiseewo awatali kufaayo ku kiseera era nabasaba babeere beetegefu okuyiga bulijjo okugatta kwebyo byebamanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga bano abagambye nti buli kyebakola tebalina kwerabira buwangwa bwabwe mwebasibuka kuba kijja kubeera kyangu okusobola okukola emirimu emirala.  Bano Ow’omumbuga abeebazizza olw’okunyweza obumu nga beegattira mu kibiina kyabwe era abawadde entanda esobola okubasomesa mu lugendo lwabwe olwobuvubuka. Ye Minisita avunaanyizibwa ku bavubuka, emizannyo n’okwewummuzaamu, Owek. Henry Kiberu Ssekabembe ategeezezza nti ekibiina kino kiri mu nkwatagana naba Buganda Youth Council era nabasaba okukola buli kimu n’obukugu okusobola okuvuganya mu nsi. Akulembeddemu abavubuka bano munnamateeka, Simon Ssenyonga agamba nti ekibiina kino kyatandikibwa mu mwaka gwa 2018 nekigendererwa kyakulaba ng’ abavubuka bwebamaliriza okusoma babaako kyebeekolera wakati nga tebanafuna mirimu.

headline: Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali awummuziddwa olw’ebyekuusa ku bwenzi
text: Kampala Eyali Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda, Stanely Ntagali, awummuziddwa ku bigambibwa nti yaganza omukazi omufumbo.  Okusinziira ku mukutu gwa Uganda Radio Network, kino kyalangiriddwa Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba Mugalu mu bbaluwa eyafulumye nga January 13, 2021. Ebbaluwa eno erumiriza nti Ntagali aliko muka omusajja gw’abadde yaganza era nga’ensonga eno ne Ntagali akkiriza nti aliko ky’agimanyiko. “Obwenzi musango munene ku ddaala lyonna. Eyali Ssaabalabirizi Ntagali yalidde mu mukyala we, obufumbo bwe ne Yesu Kristo olukwe ne bannayuganda ababadde bamutunuulira ng’ekyokulabirako.” Ebbaluwa eri abeepisikoopi bwe yagambye. Kaziimba yagasseeko nti Ekkanisa ya Uganda erina abagoberezi abawera obukadde 13 era nga bano bonna bakemeddwa era ne bonoona naye nga Bbayibuli bw’egamba mu kitabo kya Abaroma 2:23, ekkanisa erina okuteeka abakulembeze baayo ku nninga baleme kuva ku mulamwa. Ono yannyonnyodde nti yamaze dda okutegeeza Ntagali ku nsonga eno era nga yayimiriziddwa okukola obuweereza bw’ekkanisa ku mutendera gwonna wadde okugaba amasakaremento oba okukiikirira ekkanisa. Kaziimba yasabye abakkiriza okusigala nga basabira abafumbo ku njuyi zombi basobole okwenenya era basonyiwagane. “Kano akadde si kakuzunza lugambo. Kadde ka kwetonda, kadde ka kusaba era n’okwekubamu ttooci era twenenye era akadde ak’okutereeza obufumbo bwaffe mu maaso ga Katonda,” Kaziimba bwe yagasseeko. Kaziimba agamba nti Ekkanisa tegenda kuttira muntu yenna ku liiso era nga baakunyweza ekirabo ky’obufumbo era nga bakkiriza nti obufumbo bwa kitiibwa era nga bulina kubaawo wakati w’omwami omu n’omukazi omu. “Tewali muntu ali waggulu w’amateeka ga Katonda. Tuyita abo bonna abamenye etteeka lino, mugende mu maaso ga Katonda mwenenye era musabe ekisonyiwo eri abo be musobezza.” Kaziimba bwe yagambye. Kinajjukirwa nti Ntagali, 65, ye Ssaabalabirizi w’Ekkanisa ya Uganda ey’omunaana era nga yawaayo yafeesi eri Stephen Kaziimba Mugalu nga 01/ 03/2020 oluvannyuma lw’okutuuka ku myaka egiwummula.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza obumu bwebalina ne Buganda
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga asabye abasiraamu okunyweza enkolagana n’obumu bwebalina n’Obwakabaka bwa Buganda okusobola okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. Owek. Mayiga bino yabyogeredde ku mukolo Ssaabasajja Kabaka kwasiibulidde abasiraamu ogwayindidde mu bimuli bya Bulange ku Lwokutaano. “Ssaabasajja Kabaka yasiima okusiibulula abasiraamu nga ayagala tunyweze obumu n’okutabagana. Mukusiibulula abasiraamu Ssaabasajja Kabaka abeera atugamba nti baganda bammwe abo yonna gyebali mutuule nabo mu mwezi omutukuvu munyweze obwasseruganda,” Katikkiro Mayiga bwe yagambye.   Owek. Mayiga yasinzidde wano nategeeza nti abaami yonna gyebali balina okubeera abasaale okulwanyisa Siriimu kuba bebatandikiriza amakubo Mukenenya mwayita. Ate ye Supreme Mufti Sheik Muhammad Galabuzi yakubirizza abafumbo okwewala okusaabaana akawuka ka Mukenenya naye bafube okuba abeesigwa eri bannabwe kiyambako okulwanyisa akawuka Kano nga omulamwa gw’omwaka guno bweguvuga nti, ‘Abaami tubeere basaale mukulwanyisa Mukenenya.’   Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako Omumyuka Asooka owa Katikkiro Owek. Hajji Twaha Kawaase Kigongo, amyuka omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Ahmed Lwasa, Owek. Hamis Kakomo, Owek. Hajjat Mariam Mayanja Nkalubo, Loodimmeeya Erias Lukwago, Mmeeya Ali Mulyanyama n’ abakulembeze abalala mu Buganda ne Uganda. Omukolo gw’okusiibulula abasiraamu gubeerawo buli mwaka n’ekigendererwa ky’okunyweza enkolagana wakati w’Obwakabaka n’abaddu ba Allah nga guvujjirirwa kampuni ya Airtel.

headline: Obwakabaka bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda bukungubagidde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi mu ggwanga, Yonah Lwanga eyafiiridde mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) ku Ssande. Katikkiro Mayiga bw’abadde ayogerako eri bannamawulire ku Mmande mu Bulange Mmengo, ategeezezza nti ono abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ayagala ennyo Kabaka we n’ensi ye Buganda. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde omukulembeze w’eddiini asoosowaza obulungi bw’abantu. Abadde alwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu, enfuga entambulira ku mateeka, enkulaakulana n’okutabagana.” Owek. Mayiga bw’agambye. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nga Ssaabasumba Lwanga bw’abadde musajja eyeeyagalira mu nnono n’obuwangwa bwa Buganda kyokka ate nga yeeyagalira bulungi mu nsi Uganda. Mu ngeri yeemu bannabyabufuzi batenderezza abadde Ssaabasumba w’Eklesia y’Abasodokisi mu Uganda, Yonah Lwanga ng’omusajja abadde omumalirivu era eddoboozi ly’abo abanyigirizibwa era ne basaba bannayuganda okumulabirako. Lwanga yafudde ku Ssande ku myaka 76 wabula ng’ebisingawo ku kyavuddeko okufa kwe tekinnategeerekeka. Ayavuganyaako ku bwapulezidenti, Dr. Kizza Besigye amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ateerya ntama era abadde omukulembeze omulungi akadde konna. Okusinziira ku Besigye, Lwanga abadde mumalirivu, eyekkiririzaamu era abadde akola ennyo okulaba nga Uganda ekulaakulana era bw’atyo n’ategeeza nti Uganda efiiriddwa nnyo. Ate Nnampala wa gavumenti, Thomas Tayebwa amwogeddeko ng’omusajja ow’amazima awaddeyo amaanyi ge gonna okuweereza abantu ba Katonda. Omuloodi Erias Lukwago amwogeddeko ng’omusajja awaniridde obwenkanya akadde ke konna. Lwanga yazaalibwa mu 1945 ng’enzikiriza y’Abasodokisi yaakamala okutongozebwa mu Uganda wadde nga yali ebaddewo okuva mu 1900.

headline: Batenderezza emirimu gya Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga
text: Abakungubazi okuva mu nsonda z’eggwanga ez’enjawulo bakedde ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicolas e Namung’oona, okwetaba mu kuziika abadde Ssaabasumba w’Abasodokisi Yonah Lwanga eyafa ku ntandikwa y’omwezi guno mu kibuga Athens ekya Buyonaani (Greece). Omukolo gw’okuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga gwetabiddwakoabanene mu ggwanga nga bano bakulembeddwamuomumyuka w’omukukembeze w’eggwanga, Maj Gen. Jessica Aluponga y’akiikiridde Pulezidenti w’eggwanga, Katikkiro wa Buganda Charles Peter Mayiga, Katikkiro eyawummula Owek. Joseph Mulwanyammuli Ssemwogerere, akulira ekibiina kya NUP, Kyagulanyi Ssentamu Robert, akuuma entebe ya Ssaabasumbaw’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala, OmusumbaPaul Ssemwogerere, Ssaabalabirizi Steven Kaziimba Mugalu. Abalala kubaddeko; akulira olukiiko lw’abeepisikoopi Bishop Anthony Zziwa, akulira oludda oluwabula gavumenti,Owek. Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba,akulira ekibiina Kya ANT, Gen Mugisha Muntu,ababaka baPalamenti ne bannaddiini okuva mu nzikiriza ez’enjawulo. Kululwe, Katikkiro wa Buganda, CharlesPeter Mayiga atenderezza obuvumu Ssaabasumba YonahLwanga bw’abadde nabwo mu kulwanirira eddembe ly’obuntu. “Mu mirimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka gye yankwasa ntambudde bulungi ne Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwanga. Buli lwe wabaddewo ensonga yonna ng’ankubira essimu oba ng’ampandiikira.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’agasseeko. Katikkiro Mayiga annyonnyodde nti omugenzi abadde ayogera ku bikyamu mu ddoboozi ery’omwanguka era abadde muntu ayagala ennyo abantu era ng’abalwanirira mu mbeera zonna era abadde omusajja omwesimbu n’asaba abalala okumulabirako. Eyakiikiridde Pulezidenti, Jessica Alupoatenderezza enkolagana ebaddewo wakati w’Ekelesia ne gavumentiera ne yeeyama okugitwala mu maaso. Akulira ekibiina kya National Unity Platform (NUP),Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu BobiWine mukwogera kwe, ageraageranyizza Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Ssaabalabirizi Janan Luwumu olwobutekkiriranya; ng’ebikyamu ebikolebwa ku bantu abadde avaayo n’abyogerako kkaati era ono ebigambo bye tebyawukanye n’ebyakulira oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu Palamenti, Mathias Mpuuga Nsamba. Mu ngeri y’emu, Kyagulanyi asabye abantu okwefumiitiriza ku mukululo Ssaabasumba Lwanga gw’alese. Ssaabasumba Lwanga aziikiddwa mu bitiibwa by’eggwanga ebijjuvuku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo era akubiddwa emizinga esatu okusiima emirimu gy’akoledde eggwanga.

headline: Katikkiro Mayiga alambudde ku Mutiibwa Kalidinaali Wamala
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda, Charles Peter Mayiga alambudde ku Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamalaera n’abaako n’obubaka bwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka bw’atuusa olw’okufiirwa muto we, Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa. Ensisinkano eno ebaddewo leero ku Mmande mu maka ga Kalidinaali e Nsambya mu Kampala. “Ssebo Omutiibwa Kalidinaali, nsanyuse nnyo okujjako wano mu maka go era Ssaabasajja Kabaka atumye nnyo okukulaba era akusaasidde olw’okufiirwa muto wo Msgr. Henry Kyabukasa era n’antuma okutegeeza nti asiima nnyo essaala z’omuweereza era akakasiza ddala nti zimuyambye.” Katikkiro Mayiga bw’ategeezezza Ku lulwe Katikkiro Mayiga ategeezezza nti muto wa Kalidinaali Byabukasa yali amumanyi okuva mu buto kuba yakola ne kitaawe Fr. John Musoke nga batendeka abaseminariyo e Bukalasa ate ng’abamu ku abo batendese abadde nabo emyaka mingi. Katikkiro Mayiga agamba nti Msgr. Kyabukasa yali mwetowaze olw’okuba yali mugezi era ng’akimanyi ntimuto wa Kalidinaali. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, kyamukisa okuba nti Katonda abawadde ekirabo eky’okulaba Kalidinaali ebbanga lino lyonna naddala abo abamulabako ng’akyali Ffaaza era kibeera kyasanyu buli lwe bamusisinkana. Mu ngeri y’Obuwangwa, Katikkiro Mayiga mu kukubagiza kuno agenze n’ekita ky’omwenge okwongera okulaga okunyolwa. Ye Omutiibwa Kalidinaali Emmanuel Wamala asiimye Katikkiro Mayiga olw’okumulambula era n’amusiima olw’emirimu gy’akola okusitula embeera z’abantu mu Buganda. “Onsanyudde kubanga obugenyi bwo buno buziguliddewo ebijjukizo ebyo. Ssebo Kamalabyonna wa Buganda n’obuwombeefu bunginkusaba onamusize Bbaffe Ssaabasajja Kabaka ne maama Nnaabagereka, abaana beng’oma, Abalangira n’Abambejja n’Obuganda bwonna.” Ssaabasumba omuwummuze ow’essaza ekkulu ery’e Kampala bw’ategeezezezza.

headline: Ssaabasumba Lwanga waakuziikibwa munda mu Lutikko e Lubaga
text: Kampala Akulira essaza Ekkulu ery’e Kampala mu kiseera kino, Msgr . Charles Kasibante, akakasizza nti Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga  agenda kuziikibwa mu Lutikko e Lubaga. Dr. Lwanga y’agenda okubeera Bisoopu owookusatu okuziikibwa mu Lutikko eno. Eyasooka yali Bisoopu  Edouard Michaud, ono yali munnansi wa  Canada era yali omu ku baminsane Ba-White Fathers’ era ye yali Vicar w’Eklezia ya Uganda okuva mu 1933 okutuuka mu 1945 we yafiira. Munda mu Lutikko eno mwe muli n’ebisigalira bya Bisoopu Joseph Kiwanuka eyali omuddugavu eyasooka okufuna ekitiibwa kya Bisoopu era ono yafa mu 1966 nga waakayita emyaka 5 oluvannyuma lw’okufuuka Ssaabasumba w’essaza ly’e Rubaga nga bwe lyali liyitibwa mu kiseera ekyo. Okusinziira  ku Msgr. Kasibante, ababiri bano baaziikibwa ku ludda olwa ddyo olw’Eklezia emabega w’ekifo Kkwaya w’eyimbira. Kasibante agamba nti ku Lwokuna, Ssaabasumba Lwanga agenda kuziikibwa mu makkati g’abakulu bano ababiri abaasooka okuziikibwayo. Eyali Vicar Genero, Gerald Kalumba annyonnyodde nti yafuuka mpisa okuziika ba Ssaabasumba  mu Lutikko gye bali baweerereza. Ono agambye nti naye kino olumu kisinziira kuba singa Ssaabasumba yenna abaako ekiraamo ky’alese nga kiraga w’ayagala okuziikibwa olwo ekiraamo kye kissibwamu ekitiibwa. Msgr. Kalumba awadde eky’okulabirako kya Kalidinaali Emmanuel Nsubuga eyaleka ekiraamo ng’asaba bamuziike mu maka ga bakateyamba ge yali atandiseewo. Okusinziira ku bimanyiddwa mu Eklezia, Lutikko ez’enjawulo zirina ebifo ebyenjawulo ebyateekebwamu okuziikamu ba Ssaabasumba. Ennono eno yatandikira mu biseera abasomi mwe baali bayiganyizibwa era nga bangi mu budde obwa baaziikibwa mu mpuku gye baali beekukumye era ennono eno n’abaliwo kati bakyagitwala mu maaso. Singa ekifo ekiziikibwamu abakulu bano kijjula, abakulira Lutikko basobole okufuna ekifo ekirala we babaziika naye era nga bagoberera akalombolombo ke kamu. Eky’okulabirako ekirungi, e Masaka ba Bisoopu babiri baaziikibwa munda mu Lutikko y’e Villa Maria eyasooka okuzimbibwa nga tennakyusibwa kuzzibwa Kitovu. Naye Bisoopu Kaggwa bwe yafa emabegako nga tewali we bayinza muziika, bwebatyo ne basalawo okumuzimba mu kkanisa esangibwa mu limbo ya Seminale y’e Bukalasa. Okusinziira ku lupapula lwa Observe, Cansala w’e Masak, Rev. Fr. Edward Ssekabanja, yagamba nti Eklezia eno  baagiteekawo okuziikamu Babisoopu b’e Masaka awamu ne Babisoopu abalala abatali mu Masaka naye nga badyagadde okuziikibwa mu kitundu kino.

headline: Enteekateeka z’olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye, Masaka yeetegeka
text: Enteekateeka z’okujjukira olunaku lw’abajulizi zifulumye era nga Masaka yeddiziddwa omukisa okuddamu okutegeka okulamaga kw’omulundi guno oluvannyuma lw’emikolo gino obutabeerayo omwaka oguwedde olwa Ssennyiga Corona. Kino kyabikkuddwa Omusumba w’essaza ly’Eklezia erya Masaka mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire lwe yatuuzizza e Kitovu, n’asaba abakkiriza okusabira ewaka ku ttivvi n’emitimbagano okusobola okwewala omujjuzo oguyinza okuvaako ekirwadde kya Corona okweyongera. Mu mwaka gwa 2020, essaza ly’e Masaka lye lyali eryokutegeka emikolo gino era nga kaweefube w’okukung’aanya ensimbi zino yali atandikiddwako. Okulamaga kuno okunaabeerawo nga 3 June omwaka guno okutandika ssaawa ssatu ez’okumakya, abateesiteesi balambuludde ku nteekateeka nga bw’eneebeera ng’abantu wajja kukkirizibwayo bayite bokka. Okusinziira ku musumba Jjumba, abalamazi abava ebweru w’eggwanga n’abo abalamaza ebigere okuva wano mu ggwanga, nabo sibaakukkirizibwa. Omusumba Jjumba alambuludde nti omulundi guno bajja kusinga okusabira emirembe mu ggwanga, okunyweza abakristu wamu n’okuwegayirira ensi esobola okuzuula eddagala lya Ssennyiga Corona. Ku ky’abalamazi ababadde bafuna amazzi g’omukisa e Namugongo, Omusumba abasabye bafune amazzi bagatwalire abasasorodooti baabwe, bagawe omukisa eyo mu bigo byabwe kuba ku lunaku lwennyini abantu tebajja kukkirizibwa kunona mazzi gano. Omuwanika w’enteekateeka eno, Rev. Fr. Anselm Edward Ssemwogerere, yategeezezza nti ku mulundi guno beetaaga obukadde bw’ensimbi 250 okutegeka okulamaga kuno nga ku zino balinako obukadde 151 zokka. Asabye abantu okudduukirira omulimu guno. Kino kitegeeza nti beetagayo obukadde 99 wabula era okwawukanako n’okusolooza ssente okubadde kujja kubeerawo ng’abantu basonda mu kikungo, zino ezibulayo bakunze ebitongole okubakwasizaako. Eyakulembeddemu enteekateeka eno, Fr.George William Lubega, yannyonnyodde nti enkola eno abaviiriddeko okusubwa ebintu bingi omuli n’okutongoza olunaku lw’okulamaga olw’abaana abato nga be baali bagenda okukitandika nga n’amasaza amalala gaali gaakulabira okwo.

headline: Gavumenti egenda kugula ettaka ly’ekkanisa y’e Ndeeba eyamenyebwa
text: Gavumenti emalirizza enteekateeka z’okugulira Abakulisitaayo ba St. Peter’s Church mu Ndeeba, ettaka eryali lituddeko ekkanisa eno era nga likaayanirwa omugagga Dodoviko Mwanje amanyiddwa nga Dodo n’ekkanisa eno. Ekifo ewaali ekkanisa, gavumenti gyeyagala okugulira abakulisitaayo Omugagga Dodovico ne gyebuli eno akyakalambidde ng’agamba nti ettaka lirye era enkaayana zino ze zaavaako okumenya ekkanisa eweza emyaka 40 Ku biragiro by a kkooti, era okusinziira ku biwandiiko lyamuguzibwa ab’enju y’Omumbejja Evelyn Nachwa. Okusinziira ku kkooti ettaka lino lyakyusibwa mu bukyamu okudda mu mannya ga Bisoopu Danistani Nsubuga, Rev. Yuda Kitaka ne Esau Kizito era wano we yasinziira n’eragira ekkanisa okuva ku ttaka lino. Wabula oluvannyuma lw’okugimenya, Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yavumirira ekikolwa kino era n’asuubiza gavumenti ye okuddamu okuzimba ekkanisa eno. Waliwo n’ekiwandiiko era ekyayisibwa mu kyapa kya Uganda Gazette nga 28 Ogwomunaana 2020 nga Minisita w’ebyettaka alabula abantu okwesonyiwa ettaka lino erisangibwa ku bulooko nnamba 7 Poloti 39 kubanga gavumenti yali eryagala era ng’egenda kuddamu okuzimbako ekkanisa eno. Mu mateeka singa Minisita abeera mumativu nti ettaka gavumenti ly’egenda okutwala ligenda kugasiza wamu abantu, ekitundu nnamba 3 mu tteeka erikkiriza gavumenti okutwala ettaka (Land Acquistions Act) limuwa obuyinza okweddiza ettaka eryo. Etteeka lino liragira gavumenti okulaga ky’egenda okulikozesa era eriyirire oyo yenna abadde nannyini lyo era wano ekibeera kiddako ye gavumenti okuleeta omubalirizi waayo n’alaba ssente ezigya mu ttaka lino olwo ne lisasulwa. Ekya gavumenti okugulira ekkanisa ettaka lino kireeseewo ebibuuzo kubanga waliwo omusango oguli mu kkooti ento e Makindye ng’eno abantu 22 okuli omugagga Dodovico n’abapoliisi abawerako bavunaanibwa omusango gw’okubba ettaka lino, okujeemera ebiragiro, okwekobaana bazze omusango awamu n’okwonoona ebintu. Ku nsonga eno, Munnamateeka Max Mutabingwa yategeezezza nti ekikolwa kya Minisita okuyisa ekiragiro ng’ayagala ettaka lino, kiraga nti gavumenti ekkiriza nti ettaka lino lya muntu mulala era nga kkooti yasalawo ku ani nannyini ttaka omutuufu. Ono yasabye kkooti egobe omusango oguvunaanibwa Dodovico ne banne kubanga bano bavunaanibwa omusango ogukwata ku ttaka gavumenti ly’eyagala okugula erikulaakulanye. Omulamuzi wa kkooti ento e Makindye, Prossy Katushabe yasabye abo bonna abawakanya ekya gavumenti okweddiza ettaka lino, okuwaayo okwemulugunya kwabwe eri Ssaabawaabi wa gavumenti.

headline: Ab’e Kyabakadde Ssaabasumba Lwanga bamusiibulidde mu miranga
text: Kyabakadde – Kyaggwe Emiranga, ebiwoobe n’okwazirana bibuutikidde Ekeleziya ya St. Charles Lwanga e Kyabakadde ng’omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Dr Cyprian Kizito Lwanga gutuusibwa, abatuuze n’abakkiriza basobole okumusiibula. E Kyabakadde wabadde wategekeddwayo ekitambiro ky’emmisa  okuwa abatuuze n’abakkiriza mu kitundu ekyo omukisa okukuba eriiso evannyuma ku mwagalwa waabwe.  Omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba Lwanga gutwaliddwa mu Namunkanga y’amagye okuva ku kisaawe ky’eggwanga e Kololo gye gwasoose okukungubagirwa n’okumukubira emizinga. Eno gwayaniriziddwa Omusumba w’e Lugazi, Christopher Kakooza ne munne gwe. yaddira mu bigere, Omusumba Matiya Ssekamanya wamu n’eyaliko omumyuka wa Pulezidenti wa Uganda, Dr. Specioza Wandera Kazibwe naye omwana enzaalwa ey’e Kyabakadde. Ekitambiro kya mmisa kikulembeddwamu Omusumba Christopher Kakooza era omuwandiisi w’Abeepisikoopi Ssaabasumba b’abadde akulembera nga ssentebe era n’alaga obwennyamivu olwa ssentebe okubafaako. “Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde ddoboozi ly’abo abalina eddoboozi ettono oba abatalina.” Omusumba Kakooza bw’akkaatirizza. Omusumba Kakooza agambye nti omugenzi abadde munnabyankulaakulana atasangika n’anokolayo ebimu ku by’akoze ng’okutumbula essaza lya Kasana-Luweero gye yaweereza ng’Omusumba waalyo eyasookera ddala, okuyooyoota Lutikko wamu n’ekiggwa ky’abajulizi e Namugongo. Omugenzi yazaalibwa ku kyalo Kyabakadde  nga January 19, 1953. W’afiiridde ng’atumbudde ebyenkulaakulana ku kyalo kino omuli n’okubazimbira essomero St. Cyprian Kizito Secondary School -Kyabakadde. Ssaabasumba Lwanga yatandikawo ekigo ky’e Kyabakadde n’akizimbako ne Ekeleziya era nga muno mwe bamutambiridde emmisa n’okumusiibula. Okusinziira batuuze, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde atera okugenda Ku kyalo kino n’ayimbirayo emmisa naddala ku nnaku enkulu, ekintu ekibadde kikakasa abantu nti ekyalo Kyabakadde kimusula ku lufuba. Okusaba kwetabiddwamu abasomesa n’abayizi okuva ku ssomero ly’omugenzi, abakungu okuva mu gavumenti eyaawakati n’abakungu ba Ssaabasajja abakulembeddwamu Omutaka Gabunga okulira ekika ky’Emmamba, Omugenzi Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga mw’abadde azaalibwa.

headline: Okulamaga e Namugongo kuyimiriziddwa lwa coronavirus
text: Essaza ly’e Masaka eribadde litegeka okulamaga e Namugongo omwaka guno ligambye olw’ekirwadde kya coronavirus ekigenda mu maaso nga kyeriisa enkuuli mu nsi yonna livudde mu nteekateeka eno. Okusinziira ku bbaluwa eyawandiikiddwa Omusumba w’e Mityana Anthony Zziwa, akulira olukiiko lw’abasumba olumanyiddwa nga Uganda Episcopal Conference, Omusumba w’e Masaka Serverus Jjumba yamutegeezezza nti Uganda nebwekkiriza abantu okuddamu okukungaana, tekikyasoboka kuba na kulamaga omwaka guno kubanga obudde obusigaddeyo tebumala. Jjumba yategeezezza nti okutegeka okulamaga kitwala obudde wamu n’esimbi nnyingi nnyo ddala ng’era kyetaagisa enkiiko ez’enjawulo wakati w’ab’ebyokwerinda wamu n’olukiiko olutegesi. Buli nga June 3, abagoberezi ba Kurisito beeyiwa e Namugongo okujaguza okuttibwa kw’abajuluzi.  Bano battibwa ku biragiro bya Ssekabaka Daniel Mwanga, olw’okumujeemera.  Guno gwegunda okuba omulundi ogusoose obutabaayo kulamaga bukyanga June 3 lukuzibwa ng’olunaku lw’okujjukira abajuluz mu Uganda.

headline: Katikkiro mu bifananyi ng’ali e Gomba
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga yeetabye ku mukolo gw’okuggulawo Kelezia empya ey’ekisomesa kye Mawuuki e Gomba, wamu n’okujaguza emyaka 10 egya St. Joan of Ark. Omusumba w’essaza lye Kiyinda Mityana, Anthony Joseph Zziwa, yakulembeddemu okusaba.

headline: Rev. Can. Kagodo alondeddwa ku bulabirizi bwe Mukono
text: Olukiiko lw’ Abalabirizi mu Kkanisa ya Uganda ku Lwokusatu lwalonze Rev Canon Enos Kagodo Kitto nga Omulabirizi omuggya ow’ Obulabirizi bwe Mukono. Kagodo azze mu bigere by’ Omulabirizi James Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula emirimu gy’ Obulabirizi. Rev. Kitto yabadde omuwandiisi w’Obulabirizi bwe Mukono era nga agenda kutuuzibwa nga omulabirizi ow’okutaano mu February w’omwaka guno. Ebitongole n’abantu Ssekinoomu batandise dda okuvaayo n’obubaka obuyozaayoza Kagodo olw’okutuuka ku kkula lino. Kagodo olwokaano alubaddemu ne Rev Godfrey Ssengendo era gyebigweredde nga amuwangudde. Rev. Canon Kagodo yazaalibwa mu 1968 era asuubirwa okutwala mu maaso ebimu ku bintu ebibadde bituukiddwako mu bukulembeze bwa Rt Rev James Ssebaggala. Kagodo mufumbo eri Catherine Namuddu era nga Katonda yabawa ezadde ly’ abaana 7. Mungeri yeemu olukiiko lw’Abalabirizi era lulonze Rev Onesimus Asiimwe ng’ omulabirizi wa North Kigezi era nga nowa Karamoja naye alondedwa olwa leero.

headline: Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba akungubagidde Omulabirizi  Magezi
text: Kampala Ssaabalabirizi Stephen Samuel Kaziimba akungubagidde omulabirizi wa North Kigezi, Rt. Rev Benon Magezi. Magezi yafudde kawungeezi k’eggulo oluvannyuma lwa Ssabbiiti nnamba ng’azuuliddwamu ekirwadde kya COVID-19 n’atwalibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Mbarara gy’abadde ajjanjabirwa. Magezi yatuuzibwa ng’Omulabirizi nga January 8, 2017 ku Lutikko ya Emmanuel Cathedral, Kinyasano, Rukungiri. Okusinziira ku Ssaabalabirizi Kaziimba, ono abadde yakatongoza enteekateeka y’okugaziya Lutikko eno okwongera okubunyisa obukulisitaayo mu kitundu kino. Amwogeddeko ng’omusajja eyakuzibwa nga mukulisitaayo era abadde tasubwa kusaba awamu n’abennyumba ye. Magezinga tannalondebwa nga Bisoopu ye yali omuwanika w’Obulabirizi bwa North Kigezi. Bino we bijjidde nga Minisitule y’ebyobulamu yaakamala okukakasa nga bannayuganda abawera 25 baafudde ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ku Ssande nga June 13, 2021. Okusinziira ku Minisitule eno, kati omuwendo gw’abafudde ekirwadde kino okuva mu myezi gwa March omwaka oguwedde ekirwadde kino lwe kyalangirirwa bawera 459. Omugenzi Magezi alese Nnamwandu Gladys Magezi n’abaana bataano.

headline: KITALO! Ssaabasumba Lwanga bamusanze afiiridde mu buliri
text: Essaza ekkulu ery’ e Kampala likakasizza okufa kwa Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga, asangiddwa enkya ya leero.  Kansala w’essaza lya Kampala, Pius Male Ssentumbe ategeezezza nga ayita mu kiwandiiko nti mukama waabwe bamusanze mu buliri nga omuka gwamuweddemu dda. “N’ennaku nnyingi, ntegeeza endiga zonna nti Ssaabasumba w’essaza ekkulu erya Kampala Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga ayitiddwa Omukama,”Ssentumbe bw’ategeezezza. “Ssaabasumba asangiddwa mu makaage nga afudde, tusaba Mukama Katonda omwoyo ggwe agulamuze kisa era tusaba Katonda agumye abakkiriza bonna wamu n’abennyumba ye,” ekiwandiiko ekiriko omukono gwa Ssentumbe bwe kisomye. Okufa kwa Ssaabasumba kuzze nga kwa kibwatukira kuba eggulo ku Lwokutaana yalabiddwako nga akulembeddemu mmisa y’ ekkubo ly’omusaalaba ku lutikko e Lubaga.

headline: Kiikino ekituufu ekyasse Ssaabasumba Lwanga
text: Ebyafulumiziddwa eddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago ku kyaviiriddeko Ssaabasumba Kizito Lwanga okufa biraga nti ono yafudde mutima oluvannyuma lw’omusuwa okuyingiramu akatole k’omusaayi ne gusirika. Ku Lwomukaaga Ssaabasumba Lwanga yasangiddwa ng’afiiridde mu kisenge kye ekyaleeseewo ebigambo ku kituufu ekyamusse. Ku Mmande akulira eby’obulamu mu ssaza ly’Eklezia erya Kampala, Dr. Andrew Ssekitooleko, yategeezezza abakungubazi nti omugenzi yafunye ekizibu ku mutima. “Okusirika kw’omutima gwe kyavudde ku katole k’omusaayi akayingidde mu gimu ku misuwa ne kalemesa omusaayi okutuuka ku mutima, kino bwekituukawo kitwala eddakiika ssatu ku ttaano ng’omuntu afudde.” Dr. Ssekitooleko bwe yannyonnyodde. Kino kiggyeewo ebigambo n’okuteereza mbi eby’okufa kwa Ssaabasumba birimu omukono gw’omubi. Okusinziira ku Dr. Ssekitooleko, omulambo gwa Ssaabasumba baagukebedde n’abakugu 4 okuva mu ddwaliro e Mulago era nga waabaddewo abooluganda babiri wamu ne badokita abaalondeddwa Eklezia Katolika. Okusinziira ku Dr. Ssekitooleko, Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde n’obulwadde bw’omutima nga bumutawanya. Bino we bijjidde ng’eyavuganya ku bwapulezidenti, Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu, yavuddeyo ku Lwomukaaga  n’agamba nti enfa ya Ssaabasumba eriko ebibuuzo kuba ku Lwokutaano yalabwako ng’ali bulungi. Alipoota y’abakungu kati okukkakkanyizza emitima gy’abantu ku kiki ekituufu ekyavuddeko okufa kwa Ssaabasumba.

headline: Owek. Mayiga atenderezza obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi  Ssebaggala
text: Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga atenderezza nnyo obuweereza bw’ Omulabirizi Rt. Rev. William Ssebaggala bwakoze okumala akaseera era nasaba abantu okumulabirako. Bino Kamalabyonna Mayiga abyogeredde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu nsisinkano gyabaddemu n’ Omulabirizi Ssebaggala agenda okuwummula obuweereza buno mu mwezi gw’okubiri ogwa 2023. Owek. Mayiga ategezezza nti obwakabaka n’ekkanisa ya Uganda waliwo enkwatagana ey’omuggundu era waliwo essuubi nti agenda okumuddira mu bigere waakugikuuma. Ono atendereza omukululo gwalese nti nakakasa nti basanyufu nga Buganda olw’ omukululo gwagenda okuleka emabega. Katikkiro ategezezza nti obwakabaka bwa Buganda n’ekkanisa ya Uganda bukwatagana bulungi nga nabwekityo emirimu gyalese tejinaggwa tewali kuwannaanya agenda okumuddira mu bigere alina watandikira. Omulabirizi Ssebaggala abadde azze kuloopa lutabaalo lwabaddemu emyaka 12 ng’Omulabirizi w’e Mukono oluvannyuma lw’okudda mu bigere bya Rt. Rev. Eria Paul Luzinda mu 2010 nga 10.  Ku bugenyi buno, Omulabirizi ayaniriziddwa omukubiriza wolukiiko lwa Buganda Owek. Patrick Luwagga Mugumbule ngali ne Ssaabawolereza wa buganda Owek. Christpopher Bwanika abamutembeese okutuuka mu kkakalabizo lya Mukuumaddamula nebeesogga akafubo omutakiriziddwa bannamawulire. Ye Omulabirizi Ssebaggala yeebazizza obwakabaka owlokufuuka ekyokulabirako naddala mu by’obulamu nga Ssaabasajja yakulembeddemu kubanga basobodde okukulaakulanya obulabirizi ngobwakabaka kwebalabira bwatyo neyebaza Katikkiro olwa kawefube gwatadde mu kulima emmwanyi. Omulabirizi William Ssebagala abadde awerekeddwako mukyala we Tezira Ssebagala n’abaana baabwe babiri, yebazizza nnyo Ssaabasajja Kabaka olw’okukwata omumuli mu kuwandiika Bayibuli y’ Oluganda, omulimu ogwakulemberwamu Omulabirizi Ssebaggala.

headline: Obuganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya – Kabaka
text: Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II aweerezza obubaka eri Ekelesia olw’okufiirwa Ssaabasumba Yonah Lwangaeyafiira mu ggwanga lya Buyonaani (Greece) gye buvuddeko gyeyali atwaliddwa okujjanjaba oluvannyuma lw’okutawaanyizibwa ekirwadde kya Kkookolo. Omutanda obubaka buno abutisse Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga abadde yeetabye mu kuziika Ssaabasumba Lwanga ku Eklesia y’Omutukuvu Nicholas e Namung’oona mu ssaza y’e Kyaddondo. “Obuganda ne Uganda bufiiriddwa munnaddiini abadde omutabaganya w’abannaddiini era ng’assa ekitiibwa mu nzikiriza zonna. Mu buweereza bwe abadde mwetowaze, muvumu era nga mwetegefu ekiseera kyonna okulung’amya n’okuwabula ensonga eziruma oba okunyigiriza abantu ba Katonda.” Obumu ku bubaka bwe busomye. Omutanda ategeezezza nti Ssaabasumba Lwanga abadde amwebuuzaako era n’asaasira ab’enzikiriza eno kuba ono abadde abakulembedde okumala emyaka 24 miramba.

headline: Obwakabaka bulonze olukiiko olugenda okwekenneenya amateeka g’omupiira gw’amasaza
text: Obwakabaka bwa Buganda, nga buyita mu minisitule y’abavubuka, ebyemizaanyo n’okwewummuza, bulonze olukiiko lw’abantu 8, okukola ennongoosereza mu mateeka agagenda okuddukanya empaka z’amasaza. Olukiiko olulondeddwa lukulirwa Bainamani Bernard, Omuwandiisi Festus Kirumira ate bammemba kuliko; Frank Kyazze, Haruna Kyobe, Ruth Nalwanga, Mwanje Dan, Richard Kirabira ne Simon Nsubuga “Tubasuubira okutuggyirayo amateeka agasobola okutuyamba okuzimba empaka zino nga mu kino balina okulaba nga ttiimu y’essaza esobola okweyimirizaawo, okufuba okulaba nti wabeerawo obwerufu mu kukung’aanya ensimbi n’okuzisaasaanya n’empuliziganya ku nsonga y’ensimbi. Tulowooza nti amateeka gano gajja kusikiriza bamusigansimbi ne bannamikago abasobola okuteeka ssente mu muzannyo gw’omupiira.” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Ono agamba nti ttiimu zino zibadde zisanga obuzibu bunene okweyimirizaawo wakati ng’abawagizi tebaliiyo mu bisaawe olw’ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona kyokka nga waliyo abavugirizi ne bannamikago abasobola okuzikwasizaako. Okusinziira ku ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Omuk. Sulaiman Ssejjengo guno gugenda kubeera mulundi gwakubiri nga bategeka empaka zino mu muggalo, era ku luno essira bagenda kuliteeka ku kugema abazannyi era olukiiko olulondeddwa lugenda kulung’amya ku kirina okukolebwa. Agenda okukulira olukiiko luno, Bernard Bainamani ategeezezza nti omulimu ogwabwe omukulu gwakukola nnongoosereza mu mateeka agaliwo naye ate si be balina obuyinza obusembayo ku nsonga eno. “Ogwaffe gwakukung’aanya birowoozo naffe tugattemu ebyaffe tubisindike eri akakiiko akateesiteesi ak’empaka z’amasaza. Batuwadde ebbanga lwa wiiki 2 okuva olwaleero era tutandikiddewo emirimu gyaffe era tetulowooza kusukka bbanga lituweereddwa.” Bainamani bw’ategeezezza. Kinajjukirwa nti empaka z’amasaza ze zimu ku zisinga obuganzi mu ggwanga lino wabula emyaka egiyise zibadde zitawaanyizibwa nnyo ekirwadde kya Ssennyiga Corona ekyateeka eggwanga ku muggalo.

headline: ‘Quarter Final’ z’ekikopo ky’Amasaza ya Ssande eno – Omuk. Ssejjengo
text: Olukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza mu Buganda, lutegeezezza nga oluzannya lwa ‘Quarter Finals’ olwali luyimiriziddwa, lugenda luzannyibwa ku Ssande eno. Kino kirangiriddwa Ssentebe w’olukiiko oluddukanya empaka zino, Sulaiman Ssejjengo mu lukung’aana lwa bannamawulire ku Lwokubiri e Bulange Mmengo.  “Twetegereza embeera eno era twebuzizza ku bakugu ab’enjawulo okuva mu bitongole ebikwatibwako netusalawo ‘Quarter’ fayinolo zizanyizibwa ku Ssande nga 2/10/2022 mu masaza Busiro nga Mawokota ekyaza Buddu, Busiro ekyaza Gomba, Ssingo ekyaza Kyaggwe ne Buweekula ejja kuba ekyaza Bulemeezi,” Omuk. Ssejjengo bw’agambye. Omuk. Ssejjengo agamba nti bakukozesa amakubo gonna abakugu gebabalambise okusobola okutangira ensaasaana y’ekirwadde kino. Ono akubiriza ttiimu n’abawagizi okuteekawo ebifo abawagizi webanaanaabira engalo awamu n’okwambala masiki era banywerere ku biragiro ebinabaweebwa okusobola okuziyiza ekirwadde kino. Omuk. Ssejjengo bannabyamizannyo abasabye okubeera obulindaala basobole okukuuma obulamu bwabwe obulungi.

headline: Bannayuganda bakuutiddwa okwetegeka bwebaba baakuwangula mu by’emizannyo
text: Minisita wa Ssaabasajja Kabaka avunanyizibwa ku by’emizannyo, abavubuka n’okwewummuza, Oweek. Henry Sekabembe Kiberu agambye singa Uganda yeteekateeka bulungi, esobola okuwangula engule nnyingi nnyo mu by’emizannyo. Okwogera bino Sekabembe abadde mu Bulange e Mmengo mu kuggalawo omusomo gw’ebyemizannyo ogumanyiddwa nga sports administration and management training, ogumaze ennkau ssatu nga guyinda.  “Uganda nga tweteeseteese bulungi, netukola byetuteekeddwa okukola nga bwetuteekeddwa okubikola, mu butonde bwetulina, mu mmere gyetulya, ne mubaamu obuntu bulamu, ku ddaala lyonna mu nsi yonna tuteekeddwa okusobola okuvuganya n’okuwangula. Omukisa gusanga yeeteeseteese,” Sekabembe bwagambye. Omusomo guno ogwaggulwawo nga Gattonnya 11, gwawagiddwa ekibiina ekikola ku by’emizannyo mu ggwanga ekya Uganda Olympics Committee. Abamu ku beetabye mu musomo  Okusinziira ku Oweek. Hassan Kiyemba, omusomo guno gugendereddwamu okuwa obukugu obw’enjawulo munzirirukanya y’ebyemizannyo  “Tujja kufuba nnyo okulaba nga abantu abaddukanya eby’emizannyo balina obukugu obw’enjawulo tusobola okutunda n’okusikiriza abantu bangi mu masaza gonna okulaba nga bawagira eby’emizannyo,” Kiyemba bwagambye.  Omusomo gwetabiddwamu abatendesi b’omupiira mu masaza, mu bika, mu masomero, obukiiko obukulembera eby’emizannyo mu Bwakabaka nga kwekuli akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasaza, akakulembera omupiira gw’ebika, omupiira gw’okubaka ogwe’bika, akakiiko akakulembera omupiira gw’amasomero n’ekikopo kya Nnaabagereka n’abamu ku bategesi b’emisinde. Omusomo guno gwagulwawo Oweek. Ssekabembe ng’ali wamu ne pulezidenti wa Uganda Olympics Committee William Blick. Gwetabiddwamu abantu abawera 150.

headline: Golola aweze okuyimusa omutindo gwa Tooro United FC
text: Omutendesi wa kiraabu ya Tooro United omuggya Edward Golola, yeeyamye okukyusa ttiimu eno efuuke eky’okulabirako esobole okuzzaawo ettutumu lyaayo. Bweyabadde ayogerako eri akakiiko ak’ekikugu oluvanyuma lw’okumwanjula  ku Tavern Woods e Kabuusu ku Lwokusatu, Golola yasuubizza okuzzaayo ttiimu eno mu Uganda Premier League. “Twagala okufuula Tooro United FC eky’okulabirako naddala mu kuzuula ebitone ebipya era nga nkakasa nti ttiimu eno ejja kutuwa ekyo kyenyini kyetwagala, nze ndi muwanguzi era nkakasa tujja kuwangula buli mupiira, “ Golola bweyategeezezza. Abalala abagenda okuyambako Golola kuliko; Simon Ddungu amyuka omutendesi, Moses Oloya atendeka bakwasi ba ggoolo, Jamada Magaasi ne Fred Kasendeke owa ttiimu y’abato. Omukolo guno gwetabiddwako omubaka wa Fort Portal mu palamenti Alex Ruhunda, ssenkulu wa ttiimu eno Richard Epieru ne pulezidenti waayo Alice Namatovu.

headline: Basengese ttiimu z’ Amasaza ga Buganda ezinaazannya semi fayinolo
text: Olukiiko oluteekateeka empaka z’amasaza ga Buganda ez’omupiira ogw’ebigere, lukakasizza ensengeka y’emipiira egy’oluzannya lwa semifinal ezigenda okuzannyibwa nga 9 ne 16 omwezi guno ogwa October, 2022. Ku mutendera guno, Buddu egenda kuttunka ne Bulemeezi, Ssingo ettunke ne Busiro. Ensengeka zino zikakasiddwa mu lukiiko olutudde olwaleero ku Bulange e Mengo, lubadde lukubirizibwa ssentebe we mpaka zino Sulaiman Ssejjengo. Ensisinkano eno yeetabiddwamu ttiimu zonna ezatuuse ku luzannya oluddirira olw’akamalirizo. Minisita w’ebyemizannyo n’Abavubuka n’okwewummuzaamu mu bwakabaka Owek Henry Moses Ssekabembe Kiberu, akubiriza ttiimu ezituuse ku mutendera guno okwongera okunyweza empisa ate n’okukulembeza obuntubulamu. Akulira eby’ekikugu mu lukiiko oluddukanya emipiira gy’ Amasaza , Festus Kirumira agambye nti emipiira ku mutendera gw’oluzannya olusooka gigenda kutandika ku ssaawa 10. Emipiira egy’okuddingana gyakutandika ku ssaawa 9 ez’olweggulo

headline: Gomba esitukidde mu kikopo ky’Amasaza ekya 2020, ekubye Buddu 3-1
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Gomba ey’omupiira emanyiddwa nga Gomba Lions ekoze ebyafaayo bw’esitukidde mu kikopo ky’omwaka 2020 oluvannyuma lw’okukuba ttiimu ya Buddu ku mutendera gwa fayinolo ggoolo 3-1 wali ku kisaawe kya St. Mary’s Stadium ekisangibwa e Kitende. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga nga akwasa Kapiteeni wa Gomba ekikopo Gomba ekikopo kino ekiwangudde mulundi gwakutaano bw’etyo n’ewangula ekikopo, emidaali gya zzaabu awamu ne ssente obukadde 12. Omupiira guno ogunyumidde abalabi nga gubadde gulagibwa butereevu ku BBS Terefayina, gwatandikidde mu ggiya era ggoolo ya Gomba eyasoose yagifunye mu ddakiika eyookubiri mu kitundu ky’omuzannyo ekyasoose ng’eno yateebeddwa Bbaale Charles. Omusambi Ezra Namasa y’asobodde okufunira Buddu ggoolo ey’ekyenkanyi ne gubeera 1-1 wabula tewayise ddakiika ziwera, Gomba n’eteeba eyookubiri ng’eyita mu musambi George Kaddu. Mu kitundu kye kimu ekisooka nga Buddu ekyanoonya ey’ekyenkanyi, muzannyi Gift Fred yafunidde Gomba ggoolo eyookusatu olwo embeera n’etabukira bannabuddu. Ekitundu ekyokubiri kyagenze mu maaso naye nga temuli nnumba z’amaanyi era bw’egutyo omupiira ne guggwa nga guli 3-1. Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga asiimye Gomba olw’okwolesa omutindo omulungi era ne yeebaza ne Buddu olw’okulwana okutuuka ku mpaka zino. Owek. Mayiga agambye nti Ssaabasajja Kabaka yeebazizza abategesi b’empaka zino okuli abavujjirizi okuli; Airtel, Centenary Bbanka, FUFA awamu n’abalala. Gomba eweereddwa obukadde bwa Ssiringi 12 ate Buddu n’efuna obukadde 9, ttiimu ya Busiro ekutte ekyokusatu efunye obukadde 7 olwo yo Bulemeezi ekutte ekyokuna n’efuna obukadde 5.

headline: Aba Manchester United Bafunye Amawulire Amabi Oluvannyuma Lwa Chelsea  Okumegga Norwich City
text: Empaka z’ekikopo ekya English Premier League zisemberedde okukomekkerezebwa era nga wasigadde empiira esatu gyokka oluvannyuma lw’okujiwumuza olwa covid-19 mu Bungereza. Mungeri y’emu n’olutalo olw’okulwanira ekifo ekyokuna abasooka nga Chelsea, Leicester city ne Manchester United bakyalwana okufunako ababari abasigadde oluvannyuma lwa Manchester city ne Liverpool okubeera nga bbo baayitawo dda okwegatta mumpaka eza UEFA champions League ezigenda okuzannyibwa season ejja. Wabula oluvannyuma lwa team ya Chelsea okukubibwa Sheffield goolo 3-0 ku nkomerero ya wiiki ewedde olunaku lwajjo yazze engulu neyanukula essala zabawagizi ng’ekuba Norwich city goolo 1-0 nga yateebeddwa Olivia Giroud. Ono goolo eno yagitebesezza mutwe mu ddakiika essatu ezaayongeddwamu. Goolo ya Olivia Giroud newankubadde nga yabadde yakikeerezi naye yeyabadde yetaagisa okuwa tiimu ya Chelsea omukisa okubeera nga yenywereza mukifo eky’okusatu wamu ne mu bana abasooka. Abawagizi ba Manchester United wamu ne Leicester city baawulidde obujja olwa Chelsea okufuna obuwanguzi. Ekimeeza kiyimiridde bwekiti: Liverpool 93 Manchester city 72 Chelsea 63 Leicester city 59 Manchester United 59 Wolver Hampton 55 Era bw’otunura ku kimeeza ekyo olowooza Manchester United wamu ne Leicester city balina omukisa gwonna okwegatta ku bana abasooka.

headline: Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda nga aggulawo  emipiira gy’Amasaza 2021
text: Omumyuka owookubiri owa Katikkiro, Owek. Robert Waggwa Nsibirwa ategeezezza nti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka Ronald Muwenda Mutebi II asiimye okulabikako eri Obuganda ku Lwomukaaga luno era aggulewo emipiira gy’Amasaza egy’omwaka guno 2021. Bino Owek. Nsibirwa abyogeredde mu Bulange bw’abadde atongoza empaka zino ku lwa Katikkiro Charles Peter Mayiga n’asaba abantu okwaniriza Nnamunswa ku lunaku olwo era bayambeko ne ttiimu zaabwe okweteekateeka. “Mbategeeza mwenna abali wano wamu n’abatulaba ku Terefayinanti Nnyinimu Ssaabasajja Kabaka asiimye alabikeko eri Obuganda nga 20 ku Lwomukaaga luno n’omupiira ogugenda okutandikirwako wakati wa Kyaddondo ne Gomba.” Owek. Nsibirwa bw’agambye. Owek.Waggwa ategeezezza nti empaka zino zimanyiddwa okuleetawo okutabagana wakati w’abantu ba Kabaka kuba zizannyibwa abantu abali mu bitundu ebyo nga si nsonga baganda oba nedda. Okusinziira ku Owek. Waggwa, okweteekateeka mu masaza ag’enjawulo kubadde mu masaza agatali gamu ng’abakwatibwako obutereevu babanguddwa era waliwo n’ebitone ebizuuliddwa awamu n’okufuna emirimu nga byonna bibala by’amasaza. Owek. Nsibirwa agambye nti ku mulundiguno balina bye bagenda okwesibako nga mwe muli okunyweza obumu mu bantu ba Kabaka nga bakulembeza ebibagatta ng’emipiira gy’Amasaza awamu n’okusaba abaami okukola buli ekisoboka okutaasa abaana aboobuwala ku kirwadde kya Mukenenya. Ku nsonga y’obutebenkevu mu ggwanga,Owek. Nsibirwa asabye bannayuganda okumanya nti tebalina ndowooza yeemu era beewale obutujju era bakkakkanye ku busungu era beekengere n’okutebuka abalabe bonna abasobola okubatuusaako obulabe wabula basigale nga bavumu basobole okutambuza emirimu. Owek.Waggwa Nsibirwa agamba nti ekiseera kituuse gavumenti ya Uganda ku bigambo ebingi byeyogera egatteko amaanyi kisobole okukomya omuze gw’abatujju abamalawo obulamu bwa bannayuganda. AteMinisita Ssekabembe asabye abazannyi mu ttiimu z’Amasaza ez’enjawulo okukozesa omukisa guno ogubaweereddwa Ssaabasajja Kabaka okutumbula ebitone byabwe mu kusamba omupiira basobole okwekulaakulanya.  Minisita w’abavubuka n’ebyemizannyo, Owek. Ssekabembe asiimye bannamikago olw’obuwagizi bwe bawadde Obwakabaka mu kikopo ky’Amasaza ebbanga lyonna ne mu kiseera ng’ekirwadde kya Corona kizing’amizza ebyenfuna naye ne basigala ku mulamwa okukyusa embeera z’abantu ba Kabaka. Owek. Ssekabembe annyonnyodde nti omuwanguzi w’ekikopo ky’Amasaza agenda kwewangulira obukadde bwa ssente 12, owookubiri afune obukadde 9 ate owookusatu aweebwe obukadde 7 ate anaasinga banne okulengera obutimba aweebwe emitwalo gya ssiringi 30.

headline: Katikkiro ayanjudde olukiiko olunabbulula emipiira gy’Ebika
text: Katikkiro wa Buganda Owek. Charles Peter Mayiga, ayanjulidde Obuganda olukiiko olugenda okuzza endasi mu mipiira gy’Ebika. Katikkiro Mayiga n’Olukiiko olutongozeddwa Owek. Mayiga asinzidde wano n’ategeeza nti nga tuyita mu kusamba omupiira nga omuzannyo gusobola bulungi okugatta abantu ba Kabaka n’okunyweza obumu kiyambe okuzza Buganda ku ntikko. “Ffe wano mu Buganda ekituyunga ku Kabaka by’Ebika kubanga ayitibwa Ssaabataka era yakulembera abataka ab’obusolya. N’olwekyo mu kusamba omupiira kiba kyangu nnyo okugatta Abaganda, okubaagazisa Ennono n’obuwangwa bwabwe,” bwatyo Mayiga bw’alambuludde. Owek. Mayiga era agasseeko nti kino kijja kubayamba okwenyigiramu butereevu ku nsonga z’Eggwanga lyabwe. Ono agambye nti amaanyi gabadde gakendedde mu mipiira gy’Ebika wadde nga obuwagizi bw’emipiira gyebuli era nti akizudde nga abantu baagala okuwagira emipiira egitegekeddwa obulungi. Owek. Mayiga agasseeko nti bafunye abakugu bano basobole okwekenneenya ensonga eno naddala ku ngeri gyegutegekebwamu, obukugu, ensonga z’ensimbi n’ abawagizi era akakasa nti bano omulimu bajja kugukola bulungi ddala. Okusinziira ku Katikkiro Mayiga, olukiiko era lugenda kutunuulira n’omuzannyo gw’abawala ogw’okubaka kubanga nagwo gwalina abawagizi bangi naye gugenze guggwamu amaanyi. Katikkiro Mayiga alaze nti ttiimu z’Ebika zisobola bulungi okuliikiriza ttiimu ya She Cranes ssinga gubeera gutereezeddwa bulungi. Ono asabye abantu bonna abanatuukirirwa olukiiko oluno okuluwa obuwagizi kuba kyeluliko tekiyamba mizannyo mu Buganda mwokka naye ne Uganda nga batumbula ebitone buli omu afunemu. Olukiiko luno lukulemberwa Mw. Raymond Kabugo namyukibwa Sam Mpima. Abalala kuliko; Sulaiman Ssejjengo, David Katabira, Sam Mpoza, Omutaka Robert Mujabi, Hassan Badru Zziwa n’omukyala Rose Kaala.

headline: Omuwuwuttanyi Nunda yegasse ku URA F.C
text: Kiraabu y’omupiira eya URA F.C eyanjudde omuwuwuttanyi Jackson Nunda ng’ omusambi waayo era nga awereddwa endagaano y’emyaka esatu nga ali ku ttiimu eno. Nunda abadde talina ttiimu mukadde kano oluvanyuma lw’endagaano ye ne ttiimu ya KCCA F.C okugwako sizoni ewedde. Oluvanyuma lw’okuteeka omukono ku ndagaano Nunda yagambye nti yasazeewo okugenda mu URA kubanga kiraabu eno erimu okuvuganya okwamanyi nga naye kijja kumuyamba okwezimba nga omusambi. “Ndi wano okuwangulira ttiimu yange empya eya URA ebikopo wadde nga kimanyi nti tebigenda kubeera byangu.” Nunda bweyategezezza Ono ye musambi URA gwesoose okwanjula ku katale k’abazannyi ak’omurundi guno era nga ono ennamba wakugirwanira n’abasambi Saidi Kyeyune ne Shafik Kagimu.

headline: South Sudan ewangudde Uganda 1-0
text: Ttiimu ya South Sudan ey’omupiira gw’ebigere eya Bright Stars, ewangudde Uganda Cranes, ggoolo 1-0 mu mupiira oguyindidde mu kisaawe kya Nyayo Stadium mu kibuga kya Kenya -Nairobi.  Uganda Cranes yayingidde omupiira guno ng’eyagala buwanguzi okusobola okukiika mu mpaka za AFCON, wabula peneti ekubiddwa Tito Okello ewadde South Sudan obuwanguzi obusookedde ddala mu mpaka zino. Wiiki eweddde Uganda Cranes yakubye South Sudan mu kisaawe kya St. Marys Stadium e Kitende, naye nga Uganda okukubwa South Sudan olwaleero ku Mmande, kigitadde mu mbeera enzibu. Mu mupiira gwa leero, omusambi Khalid Aucho aweereddwa kkaadi emyufu mu ddakiika ya 32 oluvannyuma lw’okusika omusambi wa South Sudan. Mu ddakiika endala 5 wabaddewo ekisobyo ekikoleddwa era ne kivaamu penati eteebeddwa Okello. Wadde Uganda Cranes yakoze enkyukakyuka bw’eggyeeyo Emmanuel Okwi n’ereeta Farouk Miya naye abasudani baggyeeyo n’agomu buto. Mu ddakiika ye 80, Omusambi wa Sudan, Abdallah Asad Musa, afunye kkaadi emyufu, bw’etyo Uganda Cranes n’ekozesa omukisa guno okunoonya ggoolo naye nebigaana. Emipiira emirala egisambiddwa mu kibinja B, Burkina Faso eremaganye ne Malawi nga tewali alabye katimba ka munne. Burkina Faso y’ekulembedde ekibinja n’obubonero 8, Uganda Cranes erina 7, Malawi 4 ne South Sudan 3. Uganda yeetaaga okufuna obubonero 4 mu mipiira 2 egisigaddewo bw’eba yaakukiika mu AFCON, Uganda ezzaako Burkina Faso ekulembedde ekibinja mu Gwokuatu nga 22 omwaka ogujja ate era esembyeyo Malawi nga 30 Gwokusatu.

headline: Masaza Cup 2021: Gomba egudde maliri ne Buluuli, Ssingo eremaganye ne Kabula
text: Ttiimu y’essaza lya Ssingo eyongedde okuvumbeera mu mpaka z’emupiira gy’amasaza ez’omwaka guno bw’egudde amaliri ne ttiimu ya Kabula ku ggoolo 2-2 mu mipiira egizannyiddwa olwaleero ku FUFA Technical Centre e Njeru. Ggoolo za Kabula ziteebeddwa omuzannyi Valentino Odoi mu ddakiika eya 31 ne 38 ate nga eza Ssingo ziteebeddwa Bright Adoa ne Joseph Ssewaali. Mu ngeri yeemu Gomba nayo egudde maliri ne Buluuli mu kikopo kinonga guwedde buli ttiimu ebala ggoolo emu.
